translated: Then, having meditated on oneself as the nature of the maṇḍala of the Vairocana of the Vajra realm, one should say,🔽I am the nature of the maṇḍala of the Vairocana of the Vajra realm.

original: de nas snga ma bzhin du bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: de nas snga ma bzhin du bri bar bya'o //
translated: Then, having meditated on oneself as the nature of the maṇḍala of the Vairocana of the Vajra realm, one should say,

original: gal te chos kyi dkyil 'khor bsgrub par 'dod na /🔽snga ma bzhin du thams cad byas la /
analyzed: gal te chos kyi dkyil 'khor bsgrub par 'dod na / snga ma bzhin du thams cad byas la /
translated: I am the nature of the maṇḍala of the Vairocana of the Vajra realm.🔽Then, having meditated on oneself as the nature of the maṇḍala of the Vairocana of the Vajra realm, one should say,🔽I am the nature of the maṇḍala of the Vairocana of the Vajra realm.

original: sngar bshad pa'i snying po dang rang gi snying pos chos kyi dkyil 'khor sprul te /
analyzed: sngar bshad pa'i snying po dang rang gi snying pos chos kyi dkyil 'khor sprul te /
translated: Then, having meditated on oneself as the nature of the maṇḍala of the Vairocana of the

analyzed: rdo rje phra mo'i sbyor bas snying gnas bteg la sna bug nas byung nas sna'i rtse mor bsam par bya'o /
translated: By the yoga of the subtle vajra, lift it from the heart, and having come out of the nostrils, imagine it at the tip of the nose.

original: @86a * // de nas chos kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i sngags kyis rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa nas /
analyzed: @86a * // de nas chos kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i sngags kyis rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa nas /
translated: Then, with the mantra taught in the Dharma maṇḍala, arrange Vairocana and so forth,

original: padma 'bebs pa'i mthar thug pa rnams rang rang gi gnas su dgod par bya'o //
analyzed: padma 'bebs pa'i mthar thug pa rnams rang rang gi gnas su dgod par bya'o //
translated: up to Padma-netra in their respective places.

original: snga ma bzhin du snying po gsum brjod cing /
analyzed: snga ma bzhin du snying po gsum brjod cing /

analyzed: don rnam pa gsum bsgoms la / dharmma manda la aa sva bh'a ba ham sva yam /
translated: and meditate on the three topics.

original: zhes kyang de skad du brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes kyang de skad du brjod par bya'o //
translated: Also say this:🔽“The Dharma maṇḍala is my very own self-nature.”

analyzed: de nas chos kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i 'gro ba 'dul ba'i sngags brjod cing /
translated: Then, reciting the mantra of Subduer of Beings taught in the Dharma maṇḍala,

original: zla ba gnyis sna'i rtse mor chos kyi dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: zla ba gnyis sna'i rtse mor chos kyi dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya'o //
translated: meditate on the Dharma maṇḍala on the two moon [drops] at the tip of the nose.

original: nyin re zhing skyo bar gyur na sna bu gnas rang gi snying gar bcug la ;
analyzed: nyin re zhing skyo bar gyur na sna bu gnas rang gi snying gar bcug la ;
translated: If one becomes weary, each day, having withdrawn it into one’s heart through the nostrils,

original: badzra dhi dha tishtha zhes bya bas brtan par bya'o //
analyzed: badzra dhi dha tishtha zhes bya bas brtan par bya'o //
translated: One should stabilize with vajra-dhitha-tistha.

original: yang zla ba gcig spro ba dang bsdu ba'i sbyor bas bsgom pa de lta bus chos kyi dkyil 'khor 'grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yang zla ba gcig spro ba dang bsdu ba'i sbyor bas bsgom pa de lta bus chos kyi dkyil 'khor 'grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: Again, one should meditate for one month with that kind of yoga of emanating and gathering, and the Dharma maṇḍala will be accomplished.

original: gal te las kyi dkyil 'khor bsgrub par 'dod na /
analyzed: gal te las kyi dkyil 'khor bsgrub par 'dod na /
translated: If one wishes to accomplish the Action Maṇḍala,

original: snga ma bzhin du thams cad byas la /
analyzed: snga ma bzhin du thams cad byas la /
translated: one should do everything as before.

original: rdo rje dbyings kyi las kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i phyag rgya dang / 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las gsungs pa'i sngags kyis sna tshogs padma rgya gram blangs la /
analyzed: rdo rje dbyings kyi las kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i phyag rgya dang / 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las gsungs pa'i sngags kyis sna tshogs padma rgya gram blangs la /
translated: One should take the variegated lotus cross-legged from the Vajra Realm Action Maṇḍala, and with the mantra taught in the Maṇḍala of Subjugating the World.

original: rang gi snying po dang sngar bshad pa'i snying po lngas las kyi dkyil 'khor sprul la /
analyzed: rang gi snying po dang sngar bshad pa'i snying po lngas las kyi dkyil 'khor sprul la /
translated: One should emanate the Action Maṇḍala with one’s own essence and the five essences explained previously.

original: las kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i rig pa rnams kyis lha rnams ji lta ba'i gnas su bzhag la cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad la /
analyzed: las kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i rig pa rnams kyis lha rnams ji lta ba'i gnas su bzhag la cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad la /
translated: One should place the deities in their respective places with the awarenesses explained in the Action Maṇḍala, and perform all the rites.

original: las kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rang bzhin ni bdag yin no zhes nga rgyal bskyed nas /
analyzed: las kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rang bzhin ni bdag yin no zhes nga rgyal bskyed nas /
translated: One should generate the pride, I am the nature of the karma mandala.

original: re re zhing yang rig pa khri zlos shing re re'i rnal 'byor bya'o //
analyzed: re re zhing yang rig pa khri zlos shing re re'i rnal 'byor bya'o //
translated: One should repeat each [mantra] ten thousand times, and perform the yoga of each.

original: de lta bus las kyi dkyil 'khor 'grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta bus las kyi dkyil 'khor 'grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: In that way, one will accomplish the karma mandala.

original: 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dum bu las gsungs pa'i dngos grub rnams ni 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i phyag rgya bzhi po rnams kyis /
analyzed: 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dum bu las gsungs pa'i dngos grub rnams ni 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i phyag rgya bzhi po rnams kyis /
translated: In order to demonstrate that the powers taught in the chapter on training beings are to be accomplished by means of the four seals taught in the Great Maṇḍala of Subjugating Māra,

original: rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor byas la bsgrub par bya'o zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor byas la bsgrub par bya'o zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: one should perform the yoga of one’s deity.

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: Therefore, [the Bhagavān] declares, “Next,” and so on.

original: phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i phyag rgya thams cad bcing ba dang / 'ching ba'i mtshan nyid thams cad bslab cing bstan par bya'o //
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i phyag rgya thams cad bcing ba dang / 'ching ba'i mtshan nyid thams cad bslab cing bstan par bya'o //
translated: One should learn and teach all the seals, such as the great seal, and all the characteristics of binding.

original: de la 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bstan pa nyid kyis rnam par snang mdzad dang / chos kyi rdo rje ma dang / sangs rgyas dbang bskur ma dang / padma'i padmo dang / @86b sna tshogs mchog ma rnams kyi phyag rgya chen po dang /
analyzed: de la 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bstan pa nyid kyis rnam par snang mdzad dang / chos kyi rdo rje ma dang / sangs rgyas dbang bskur ma dang / padma'i padmo dang / @86b sna tshogs mchog ma rnams kyi phyag rgya chen po dang /
translated: In the great maṇḍala of Subjugation of the Three Worlds, the great mudrā, pledge, doctrine, and action mudrās of Vairocana, Dharmavajra, Buddha-āveśa, Padma-padma, and Viśva-varā are taught.

original: dam tshig dang / chos dang / las kyi phyag rgya rnams 'di'i yang yin par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: dam tshig dang / chos dang / las kyi phyag rgya rnams 'di'i yang yin par shes par bya'o //
translated: You should know that these are also the mudrās of this maṇḍala.

original: ji ltar rnam par snang mdzad kyi padma'i rigs kyi phyag rgya bzhi po'i dkyil 'khor bzhin du 'gro ba 'dul ba'i phyag rgya bzhi po'i dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul gyis bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: ji ltar rnam par snang mdzad kyi padma'i rigs kyi phyag rgya bzhi po'i dkyil 'khor bzhin du 'gro ba 'dul ba'i phyag rgya bzhi po'i dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul gyis bri bar bya'o //
translated: Just as the maṇḍala of the four mudrās of Vairocana’s Lotus Family, so too all the maṇḍalas of the four mudrās of Subjugation of the Three Worlds, and so forth, should be drawn in the manner of the great maṇḍala.

original: rang rang gi phyag rgya rnams kyis dngos grub thams cad ster bar 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos gsungs so //
analyzed: rang rang gi phyag rgya rnams kyis dngos grub thams cad ster bar 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos gsungs so //
translated: The Blessed One, Great Vajradhara, has said that all the siddhis will be bestowed by their respective mudrās.”

original: 'di skad ston pa yin te /🔽'gro ba 'dul ba'i dbus su bris la /
analyzed: 'di skad ston pa yin te / 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dbus su bris la /
translated: This is the teaching:🔽One should draw in the center of the maṇḍala of the Subjugation of the Three Worlds

original: 'gro ba 'dul ba'i gnas kyi shar phyogs kyi padma'i 'dab ma la sangs rgyas padma'i padmas mtshan pa'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa padma dang zla ba la bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'gro ba 'dul ba'i gnas kyi shar phyogs kyi padma'i 'dab ma la sangs rgyas padma'i padmas mtshan pa'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa padma dang zla ba la bri bar bya'o //
translated: the five-tined vajra marked with a lotus and a lotus marked with a buddha on the eastern petal of the lotus of the Subjugation of the Three Worlds.

original: gtsug phud sangs rgyas kyi gnas lho ru padma'i rgyal po'i padma'i lcags kyu /
analyzed: gtsug phud sangs rgyas kyi gnas lho ru padma'i rgyal po'i padma'i lcags kyu /
translated: In the south, in the place of Buddhaśikhin, the lotus king’s iron hook.

original: padma'i ting nge 'dzin gyi gnas nub tu padma legs pa'i padma'i khu tshur gnyis ;
analyzed: padma'i ting nge 'dzin gyi gnas nub tu padma legs pa'i padma'i khu tshur gnyis ;
translated: In the west, in the place of Padmasamādhi, the lotus good’s pair of fists.

original: padma nges pa'i dbang phyug gi gnas su byang du padma chags pa'i padma'i mda' gzhu bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: padma nges pa'i dbang phyug gi gnas su byang du padma chags pa'i padma'i mda' gzhu bri bar bya'o //
translated: In the north, in the place of Padmanātha, one should draw the lotus passion’s bow and arrow.

original: de la 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i snying po dang / phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i snying pos bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: de la 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i snying po dang / phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i snying pos bri bar bya'o //
translated: There, one should draw with the essence taught in the maṇḍala of the Subjugation of the Three Worlds and with the essence taught in the maṇḍala of the four seals.

original: sangs rgyas padma la sogs pa'i phyag rgya ni dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i snying po nyid brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas padma la sogs pa'i phyag rgya ni dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i snying po nyid brjod par bya'o //
translated: The mudras of Buddha Lotus and so forth are the essence mantras explained in the great maṇḍala.

original: snga ma bzhin du gtsug phud sangs rgyas kyi phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i snying po dang / dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i dbus su bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: snga ma bzhin du gtsug phud sangs rgyas kyi phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i snying po dang / dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i dbus su bri bar bya'o //
translated: As before, in the maṇḍala of the four mudras of Buddha Śikhin, the essence mantras are explained, and in the great maṇḍala, they are drawn in the center.🔽In the place of Lokanātha, the mudra of lotus frown;

original: 'gro ba 'dul ba'i gnas su padma'i khro gnyer gyi mtshan ma /🔽padmas mtshan pa'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i phyag rgya'o //🔽gtsug phud sangs rgyas kyi gnas su padma nyi ma'i phyag rgya /
analyzed: 'gro ba 'dul ba'i gnas su padma'i khro gnyer gyi mtshan ma / padmas mtshan pa'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i phyag rgya'o // gtsug phud sangs rgyas kyi gnas su padma nyi ma'i phyag rgya /
translated: in the place of Padmanetra, the mudra of the wish-fulfilling jewel marked with a lotus;🔽in the place of Buddha Śikhin, the mudra of the sun marked with a lotus;🔽in the place of Padmasamādhi, the mudra of the blooming lotus;🔽in the place of Padmanarteśvara, the mudra of the glory of the lotus;

original: padma nges pa'i dbang phyug gi gnas su padma rgyu'i phyag rgya /
analyzed: padma nges pa'i dbang phyug gi gnas su padma rgyu'i phyag rgya /

analyzed: dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i snying pos bri bar bya'o //

analyzed: snga ma bzhin du padma nges pa'i dbang phyug gi dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'am /

original: phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i snying pos bri ba dang / 'gro ba 'dul ba'i gnas su padma gar gyi dbang phyug gi phyag rgya /
analyzed: phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i snying pos bri ba dang / 'gro ba 'dul ba'i gnas su padma gar gyi dbang phyug gi phyag rgya /
translated: One should draw with the essence mantra explained in the mandala of the four seals, or with the seal of Padmanarteshvara in the place of Vinayaka,

original: gtsug phud sangs rgyas kyi gnas su padma bsrung ba'i phyag rgya /
analyzed: gtsug phud sangs rgyas kyi gnas su padma bsrung ba'i phyag rgya /

analyzed: padma ting nge 'dzin gyi gnas su padma khu tshur gyi phyag rgya /
translated: the seal of Padmasana in the place of Padma Samaya,

original: padma nges pa'i dbang phyug gi gnas su padma gnod sbyin gyi phyag rgya dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i tshul gyis bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: padma nges pa'i dbang phyug gi gnas su padma gnod sbyin gyi phyag rgya dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i tshul gyis bri bar bya'o //

original: 'di dag gi phyag rgya chen po dang / dam tshig dang / chos dang / las kyi phyag rgya rnams ni 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa kho na nyid gzung bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'di dag gi phyag rgya chen po dang / dam tshig dang / chos dang / las kyi phyag rgya rnams ni 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa kho na nyid gzung bar bya'o //
translated: One should take only the great seal, pledge seal, doctrine seal, and action seal of these deities as explained in the great mandala of Vinayaka.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid bsdus pa'i 'grel pa /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid bsdus pa'i 'grel pa /

original: de kho na nyid snang bar byed pa las phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'grel pa rdzogs so /🔽// / de ltar bar ma la dga' ba'i sems can rjes su gzung ba'i phyir /

original: phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor bshad nas /
analyzed: phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor bshad nas /

analyzed: mdor bsdus pa la dga' ba'i sems can rjes su gzung ba'i phyir /
translated: in order to care for those beings who delight in the concise,

original: 'gro ba 'dul ba'i phyag rgya gcig pa'i dkyil 'khor ni /
analyzed: 'gro ba 'dul ba'i phyag rgya gcig pa'i dkyil 'khor ni /

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: Then, etc.

original: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni de ma thag pa ste /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni de ma thag pa ste /
translated: The word “then” is immediately after;

original: dang por sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rjes thogs nyid la'o //
analyzed: dang por sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rjes thogs nyid la'o //
translated: it is immediately after the first yoga samādhi.

original: 'dir dang por sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni 'gro ba 'dul ba'i phyag rgya chen po khang bu brtsegs pa dang / gdan bskyed pa'i mthar thug pa'i bar du shes par bya'o //
analyzed: 'dir dang por sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni 'gro ba 'dul ba'i phyag rgya chen po khang bu brtsegs pa dang / gdan bskyed pa'i mthar thug pa'i bar du shes par bya'o //
translated: Here, the first yoga samādhi should be understood as the great mudra of Subjugation of Maras up to the generation of the palace and the seat.

original: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang po ni 'gro ba 'dul ba'o //
analyzed: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang po ni 'gro ba 'dul ba'o //
translated: Ārya Avalokiteśvara is Subjugation of Maras.

original: 'di zhes bya ba ni blo la gnas pa'o //
analyzed: 'di zhes bya ba ni blo la gnas pa'o //
translated: This is the abode of the mind.

original: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi 'gro ba de thams cad gdul bar bya ba dang / dam pa'i don gyi dngos grub thams cad thob par bya ba dang / gang gis lung dang rtogs pa'i bdag nyid la rab tu 'jog pa de ni 'gro ba 'dul ba'i ste /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi 'gro ba de thams cad gdul bar bya ba dang / dam pa'i don gyi dngos grub thams cad thob par bya ba dang / gang gis lung dang rtogs pa'i bdag nyid la rab tu 'jog pa de ni 'gro ba 'dul ba'i ste /
translated: The taming of all migrators is the taming of all migrators in all world-realms, the attainment of all powers of the ultimate truth, and the establishment of all migrators in the nature of the scriptures and realizations.

original: spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug der nges pa'i ye shes @87b so ;
analyzed: spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug der nges pa'i ye shes @87b so ;
translated: Avalokitesvara is ascertained as that.

original: / de ston par byed pa'i sgra'i tshul la yang rgyu la 'bras bu btags nas 'gro ba thams cad 'dul ba'i rang gi snying po zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: / de ston par byed pa'i sgra'i tshul la yang rgyu la 'bras bu btags nas 'gro ba thams cad 'dul ba'i rang gi snying po zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The essence of all migrators is the method of the sound that teaches that, figuratively designating the cause with the effect.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis rang gi snying po 'di gsungs pa ni bshad pa'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis rang gi snying po 'di gsungs pa ni bshad pa'o //
translated: The Bhagavat's statement of this essence is the explanation.

original: aom sarbba dz'a gad bi na ya zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: aom sarbba dz'a gad bi na ya zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: Om sarva jagad vighnam vinaya and so forth.

original: 'di skad ston pa yin te byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo'i spyad pa spyod pa rnams kyis 'gro ba 'dul ba'i phyag rgya gcig pa'i dkyil 'khor bri bar 'dod pa na /
analyzed: 'di skad ston pa yin te byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo'i spyad pa spyod pa rnams kyis 'gro ba 'dul ba'i phyag rgya gcig pa'i dkyil 'khor bri bar 'dod pa na /
translated: This is what is being taught: Bodhisattvas who practice the conduct of the gateway of secret mantra, when they wish to draw the mandala of the single mudra of Subjugation of Maras,

original: 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i tshul gyis 'gro ba 'dul ba'i rnal 'byor dang / de las bshad pa'i rnal 'byor chen po ji lta ba bzhin du byas nas /
analyzed: 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i tshul gyis 'gro ba 'dul ba'i rnal 'byor dang / de las bshad pa'i rnal 'byor chen po ji lta ba bzhin du byas nas /
translated: should perform the yoga of Subjugation of Maras according to the method explained in the great mandala of Subjugation of Maras, and the great yoga explained therein,

original: khang bu brtsegs pa nas gdan rnam pa gnyis bskyed la /
analyzed: khang bu brtsegs pa nas gdan rnam pa gnyis bskyed la /
translated: and generate the two seats in the stacked house.

original: nam mkha'i phyogs nas babs te /
analyzed: nam mkha'i phyogs nas babs te /
translated: Then, descending from the sky,🔽one should sit on the lotus and moon as before, binding the great mudra.

original: snga ma bzhin du padma dang zla ba'i steng du phyag rgya chen po bcings te 'dug par bya'o zhes bya ba 'di tsam gyis ni dang por sbyor ba mchog gi ting nge 'dzin to //
analyzed: snga ma bzhin du padma dang zla ba'i steng du phyag rgya chen po bcings te 'dug par bya'o zhes bya ba 'di tsam gyis ni dang por sbyor ba mchog gi ting nge 'dzin to //
translated: This much is the samadhi of supreme initial union.

original: bshad ma thag pa'i 'gro ba 'dul ba'i snying pos mdun du gnas pa'i padma dang zla ba la /
analyzed: bshad ma thag pa'i 'gro ba 'dul ba'i snying pos mdun du gnas pa'i padma dang zla ba la /
translated: With the essence mantra of Subjugation of Maras just explained, on the lotus and moon in front,

original: rang gi snying pos 'gro ba 'dul ba sprul la gzhag par bya'o zhes bya ba 'di ni 'dir 'gro ba 'dul ba'i phyag rgya gcig pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gnyis pa yin no //
analyzed: rang gi snying pos 'gro ba 'dul ba sprul la gzhag par bya'o zhes bya ba 'di ni 'dir 'gro ba 'dul ba'i phyag rgya gcig pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gnyis pa yin no //
translated: One should establish the emanation that tames migrators with one's essence. This is the second samādhi called the supreme maṇḍala king of the maṇḍala of the single mudra of the tamer of migrators.

original: de nas bsdu ba dang byin gyis brlab pa nas brtsams pa ni /
analyzed: de nas bsdu ba dang byin gyis brlab pa nas brtsams pa ni /
translated: Then, beginning with the gathering and consecration,

original: las kyi rgyal po mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gsum pa yin par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: las kyi rgyal po mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gsum pa yin par shes par bya'o //
translated: it should be understood as the third samādhi called “the supreme king of actions.”

original: 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dum bu las gsungs pa'i dngos grub thams cad 'gro ba 'dul ba'i phyag rgya gcig pa'i dkyil 'khor du dam tshig dang dbang bskur bas bsgrub par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dum bu las gsungs pa'i dngos grub thams cad 'gro ba 'dul ba'i phyag rgya gcig pa'i dkyil 'khor du dam tshig dang dbang bskur bas bsgrub par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to demonstrate the meaning of “all the siddhis that are taught in the chapter of the tamer of migrators are accomplished through the samaya and empowerment in the maṇḍala of the single mudra of the tamer of migrators,”

original: de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang pos zhes bya ba la sogs pas phyag rgya gcig pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyi las kyi cho ga dang slob ma 'jug pa'i cho ga rgyas pa 'di gsungs te /
analyzed: de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang pos zhes bya ba la sogs pas phyag rgya gcig pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyi las kyi cho ga dang slob ma 'jug pa'i cho ga rgyas pa 'di gsungs te /
translated: This is the extensive explanation of the ritual of the master’s acts and the ritual for inducting the disciples into the maṇḍala of the single mudra.

original: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni skabs su bab pa'o //
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni skabs su bab pa'o //
translated: The word “then” means “at that time.”

original: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po ni 'gro ba 'dul ba'o //
analyzed: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po ni 'gro ba 'dul ba'o //
translated: The noble Avalokiteśvara is the tamer of beings.

original: 'di zhes bya ba ni 'chad par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: 'di zhes bya ba ni 'chad par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: “ This” refers to what is about to be explained.

original: 'gro ba thams cad 'dul bas na 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mtshon pa yin no //
analyzed: 'gro ba thams cad 'dul bas na 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mtshon pa yin no //
translated: Since all beings are tamed, the noble Avalokiteśvara is the symbol.

original: @88a * // 'gro ba thams cad 'dul bzhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gsungs pa ni bshad pa'o //
analyzed: @88a * // 'gro ba thams cad 'dul bzhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gsungs pa ni bshad pa'o //
translated: The maṇḍala called “Taming All Beings” is explained.

original: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni de ma thag pa brjod pa ste /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni de ma thag pa brjod pa ste /
translated: The word “then” refers to the immediately following statement.

original: sngon du bsnyen pa'i rjes thogs la zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: sngon du bsnyen pa'i rjes thogs la zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: It means “after the prior service.”

original: 'di skad ston pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di skad ston pa yin te /
translated: This is what is being taught.

original: 'gro ba 'dul bas ni phyag rgya gcig pa'i ting nge 'dzin gsum bsgom pa sngon du 'gro bas 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor ji srid mngon sum du mthong ba de srid kyi bar du bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: 'gro ba 'dul bas ni phyag rgya gcig pa'i ting nge 'dzin gsum bsgom pa sngon du 'gro bas 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor ji srid mngon sum du mthong ba de srid kyi bar du bsgom par bya'o //
translated: By means of the Subjugation of the Three Worlds, one should meditate on the three samadhis of the Single Seal, and then meditate on the mandala of the Subjugation of the Three Worlds until one sees it directly.

original: de nas de'i rjes la dkyil 'khor 'di nyid bri bar bya ba'am /
analyzed: de nas de'i rjes la dkyil 'khor 'di nyid bri bar bya ba'am /
translated: Then, after that, one should draw this very mandala.

original: yang na dkyil 'khor chen po'i cho gas rnal 'byor chen po byas la /
analyzed: yang na dkyil 'khor chen po'i cho gas rnal 'byor chen po byas la /
translated: Or else, having performed the great yoga by the rite of the great mandala,

original: re re zhing yang sngags 'bum bzlas par byas te /
analyzed: re re zhing yang sngags 'bum bzlas par byas te /
translated: one should recite each mantra one hundred thousand times.

original: de nas ting nge 'dzin rnam gsum zhag bdun bsgoms pa'i rjes thogs la dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: de nas ting nge 'dzin rnam gsum zhag bdun bsgoms pa'i rjes thogs la dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o //
translated: Then, immediately after meditating on the three samadhis for seven days, one should draw the mandala.

original: de nas zhes bya ba ni rgyu de'i phyir gyi don te /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba ni rgyu de'i phyir gyi don te /
translated: Then means for that reason.🔽Because if there is no entry into the mandala of the Single Seal, then beings who delight in the concise will not be accepted.

original: gang gi phyir phyag rgya gcig pa'i dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa med na mdor bsdus pa la dga' ba'i sems can rjes su gzung bar mi 'gyur ba de'i phyir /
analyzed: gang gi phyir phyag rgya gcig pa'i dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa med na mdor bsdus pa la dga' ba'i sems can rjes su gzung bar mi 'gyur ba de'i phyir /
translated: Therefore,

original: de nas rab tu bshad bya ba //
analyzed: de nas rab tu bshad bya ba //
translated: then, it should be explained.

original: 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor te //
analyzed: 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor te //
translated: The mandala of Subduing Migrating Beings.

original: zhes bya'o // dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni //
analyzed: zhes bya'o // dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni //
translated: In the manner of the great mandala,

original: zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni /
translated: means

original: 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul gyis yang dag par bri ba'o //
analyzed: 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul gyis yang dag par bri ba'o //
translated: in the manner of the great mandala of Subduing Migrating Beings.

original: phyi yi dkyil 'khor bri bar bya //
analyzed: phyi yi dkyil 'khor bri bar bya //
translated: One should draw the outer mandala.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //🔽der ni 'dab ma kun khyab pa //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o // der ni 'dab ma kun khyab pa //
translated: and so forth are easy to understand.🔽There, one should draw the form of the all-pervading lotus,

original: sna tshogs gzugs ni bri bar bya //
analyzed: sna tshogs gzugs ni bri bar bya //
translated: pervading all the petals, with various forms.

original: zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni /
translated: means

original: de la dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su 'dab ma kun la padma'i rigs des khyab cing sprul pa'i ngang tshul gang la mnga' ba de ni 'dir 'dab ma kun khyab pa'o //
analyzed: de la dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su 'dab ma kun la padma'i rigs des khyab cing sprul pa'i ngang tshul gang la mnga' ba de ni 'dir 'dab ma kun khyab pa'o //
translated: there, in the center of the mandala, the one who pervades all the petals with the lotus family, and has the nature of emanation, is here called the all-pervading.

original: rnam pa sna tshogs pa du ma sangs rgyas padma la sogs pa'i gzugs gang la mnga' ba 'di ni sna tshogs so //
analyzed: rnam pa sna tshogs pa du ma sangs rgyas padma la sogs pa'i gzugs gang la mnga' ba 'di ni sna tshogs so //
translated: The one who has various forms of many kinds, such as the Buddha lotus and so forth, is the various.

original: 'dab ma kun la khyab pa yang yin la sna tshogs pa'i gzugs kyang 'di yin pas na /
analyzed: 'dab ma kun la khyab pa yang yin la sna tshogs pa'i gzugs kyang 'di yin pas na /
translated: Since it is all-pervading on all the petals, and it has various forms,

original: padma kun la khyab pa sna tshogs pa'i gzugs te /
analyzed: padma kun la khyab pa sna tshogs pa'i gzugs te /
translated: The lotus is pervaded by the form of the various.

original: 'gro ba 'dul ba de bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'gro ba 'dul ba de bri bar bya'o //
translated: One should draw the one who tames migrators.

original: de'i don ni 'di yin te ;
analyzed: de'i don ni 'di yin te ;
translated: The meaning of this is as follows.

original: 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po bzhin du phyi dang nang gi dkyil 'khor de bris la /
analyzed: 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po bzhin du phyi dang nang gi dkyil 'khor de bris la /
translated: Just like the great maṇḍala of the Tamer of Migrators, one should draw the outer and inner maṇḍala.

original: dkyil 'khor gyi lte bar yi ge hr'i las padma de'i steng du yi ge aa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bskyed la /
analyzed: dkyil 'khor gyi lte bar yi ge hr'i las padma de'i steng du yi ge aa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bskyed la /
translated: In the center of the maṇḍala, from the letter hrīḥ, there is a lotus. Upon that, from the letter aṃ, there is a moon maṇḍala.

original: aom sarbba dza gang bi na ya ma h'a satva a'a gatstsha sh'i ghram bi shva r'u bam darsha ya ma ma tsa sarbba siddhi ya pra yatstsha hr'i /
analyzed: aom sarbba dza gang bi na ya ma h'a satva a'a gatstsha sh'i ghram bi shva r'u bam darsha ya ma ma tsa sarbba siddhi ya pra yatstsha hr'i /
translated: oṃ sarva-jagad-vinaya-mahāsattva āgaccha śīghraṃ viśvarūpaṃ rudraṃ darśaya mama sarva-siddhiṃ prayaccha hūṃ

original: @88b zhes brjod pas /
analyzed: @88b zhes brjod pas /
translated: By reciting this,

original: bcom ldan 'das 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po dang / gzungs dang / chos dang / las kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i lha'i gzugs kyi spyi gtsug nas brtsams nas rkang mthil gyi bar du 'od zer gyi tshul gyis 'byin pa bris la /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po dang / gzungs dang / chos dang / las kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i lha'i gzugs kyi spyi gtsug nas brtsams nas rkang mthil gyi bar du 'od zer gyi tshul gyis 'byin pa bris la /
translated: the Bhagavat is drawn in the form of light rays, beginning from the crown protuberance of the deity’s form and ending at the soles of the feet, as taught in the great maṇḍala of the Tamer of Migrators, the maṇḍalas of retention, Dharma, and action.

original: nam mkha'i phyogs nas phab ste /
analyzed: nam mkha'i phyogs nas phab ste /
translated: Having brought it down from the sky,

original: gzugs brnyan dang gcig tu bsre bar bya'o //
analyzed: gzugs brnyan dang gcig tu bsre bar bya'o //
translated: it should be mixed together with the reflection.🔽Then,

original: de nas zhes bya ba ni rjes thogs nyid la'o //
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba ni rjes thogs nyid la'o //
translated: immediately after that,

original: 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul gyis rang gi cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad la /
analyzed: 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul gyis rang gi cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad la /
translated: having performed all the rites of oneself in the manner of the great maṇḍala of Vinayaka,

original: rang la byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa yang byas la /
analyzed: rang la byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa yang byas la /
translated: and having also performed the self-consecration,

original: padma che ge mo zhes rang gi ming nas brjod nas /
analyzed: padma che ge mo zhes rang gi ming nas brjod nas /
translated: having uttered one’s own name, such as “Lotus,”

original: 'gro ba 'dul ba'i phyag rgya chen po bcings te /
analyzed: 'gro ba 'dul ba'i phyag rgya chen po bcings te /
translated: having bound the great seal of Vinayaka,

original: aom sarbba dzdza gad bi na ya ma h'a sa tra a'a gtstsha sh'i ghram bi shva r'u bam darsha ya ma ma tsa sarbba siddhi ya pra yatstsha hr'i aa zhes brjod pas /
analyzed: aom sarbba dzdza gad bi na ya ma h'a sa tra a'a gtstsha sh'i ghram bi shva r'u bam darsha ya ma ma tsa sarbba siddhi ya pra yatstsha hr'i aa zhes brjod pas /
translated: and having uttered “Oṃ sarva-jaḍa-vinaya mahāsattva āgaccha śīghraṃ viśva-rūpaṃ darśaya mama sarva-siddhiṃ prayaccha hrīḥ āḥ,”

original: 'gor ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su rdo rje padmo bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: 'gor ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su rdo rje padmo bsam par bya'o //
translated: one should imagine the vajra lotus in the center of the maṇḍala of Vinayaka.

original: de nas badzra padmo aa ham zhes brjod cing /
analyzed: de nas badzra padmo aa ham zhes brjod cing /
translated: Then, having uttered “vajra-padma āḥ haṃ,”

original: rdo rje padma'i nga rgyal bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje padma'i nga rgyal bsgom par bya'o //
translated: one should meditate on the pride of the vajra lotus.

original: dza gad bi na yo aa ham zhes brjod pas padma de nyid 'gro ba 'dul ba'i rang bzhin du bdag nyid bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: dza gad bi na yo aa ham zhes brjod pas padma de nyid 'gro ba 'dul ba'i rang bzhin du bdag nyid bsgom par bya'o //
translated: Saying “jaḥ hūṃ vaṃ hoḥ, I am Padmanarteśvara,” one should meditate on oneself as having the nature of Padmanarteśvara.

original: de nas bsdu ba byas la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bstod de /
analyzed: de nas bsdu ba byas la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bstod de /
translated: Then, having performed the dissolution, one should praise with the one hundred and eight names.

original: rta mgrin la sogs pa'i las kyi phyag rgya rnams kyis dgug pa dang ; gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du byas la /
analyzed: rta mgrin la sogs pa'i las kyi phyag rgya rnams kyis dgug pa dang ; gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du byas la /
translated: Having summoned, caused to enter, bound, and controlled with the action seal of Hayagrīva and so forth,

original: padma'i gnod sbyin gyis bgegs bsal la ra ba dang dra ba byas te /
analyzed: padma'i gnod sbyin gyis bgegs bsal la ra ba dang dra ba byas te /
translated: one should dispel obstructors with the lotus yakṣa, and create a fence and a tent.

original: padma'i khu tshur gyis sgo bcad la /
analyzed: padma'i khu tshur gyis sgo bcad la /
translated: Having closed the door with the lotus fist,

original: padma srung ba'i phyag rgyas bsrung ba thams cad yang dag par bsrungs la /
analyzed: padma srung ba'i phyag rgyas bsrung ba thams cad yang dag par bsrungs la /
translated: one should protect all with the protection of the lotus seal.

original: 'gro ba 'dul ba'i snying pos mchod yon phul nas /
analyzed: 'gro ba 'dul ba'i snying pos mchod yon phul nas /
translated: Having offered a libation with the essence of Padmanarteśvara,

original: zhal bsil gyi sngags dang / phyag rgyas zhal bsil dbul lo //
analyzed: zhal bsil gyi sngags dang / phyag rgyas zhal bsil dbul lo //
translated: one should offer water for the mouth with the mantra and seal of water for the mouth.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgyas bsgrubs te /
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgyas bsgrubs te /
translated: Then, having accomplished with the pledge seal of the Bhagavat,

original: chos dang / las dang / phyag rgya chen po rnams kyis rgyas btab ste /
analyzed: chos dang / las dang / phyag rgya chen po rnams kyis rgyas btab ste /
translated: Seal it with the Dharma, the karma, and the great seal.

original: dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgyas dbang bskur la /
analyzed: dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgyas dbang bskur la /
translated: Empower it with the empowerment seal.

original: yang mchod yon phul nas mchod pa thams cad kyis yang dag par mchod de gnang ba nod pa'i rjes thogs kho na la /
analyzed: yang mchod yon phul nas mchod pa thams cad kyis yang dag par mchod de gnang ba nod pa'i rjes thogs kho na la /
translated: Again, offer the libation and make offerings with all the offerings, and immediately after you have received permission,

original: 'gro ba 'dul ba'i phyag rgya gcig pa'i dkyil 'khor 'dir cho ga rgyas pa thams cad kyis ji lta ba bzhin du btsud nas zhes bya ba yin te /🔽'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i 'jug pa'i cho @89a * //
analyzed: 'gro ba 'dul ba'i phyag rgya gcig pa'i dkyil 'khor 'dir cho ga rgyas pa thams cad kyis ji lta ba bzhin du btsud nas zhes bya ba yin te / 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i 'jug pa'i cho @89a * //
translated: enter into this mandala of the single seal of Subjugation of the Three Worlds just as it is with all the extensive rites.

original: gas padma'i slob ma gzhug par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gas padma'i slob ma gzhug par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning of enter is that you should enter the mandala of the disciple lotus.

original: de bzhin du bsgo ste zhes bya ba ni 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i cho ga rgyas pa thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du byas nas /
analyzed: de bzhin du bsgo ste zhes bya ba ni 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i cho ga rgyas pa thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du byas nas /
translated: In the same way, instruct means that you should perform all the extensive rites of the mandala of Subjugation of the Three Worlds just as it is.

original: padma'i dngos grub kyi rdo rje brtul zhugs kyi bar du slob ma la bshad pa bzhin du 'dir yang bsgo bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: padma'i dngos grub kyi rdo rje brtul zhugs kyi bar du slob ma la bshad pa bzhin du 'dir yang bsgo bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: One should explain to the disciple up to the vajra conduct of the spiritual powers of Padma, as it is stated here.

original: gzhung 'di tsam gyis ni slob dpon gyi las dang slob ma 'jug pa'i cho ga rgyas pa de ltar bstan nas /
analyzed: gzhung 'di tsam gyis ni slob dpon gyi las dang slob ma 'jug pa'i cho ga rgyas pa de ltar bstan nas /
translated: This much of the text teaches the extensive ritual for inducting the disciple into the master's work.

original: da ni 'gro ba 'dul ba'i phyag rgya gcig pa'i dkyil 'khor du dam tshig dang dbang bskur ba thob pa rnams kyis dngos grub kyi ye shes bsgrub par bya'o zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni 'gro ba 'dul ba'i phyag rgya gcig pa'i dkyil 'khor du dam tshig dang dbang bskur ba thob pa rnams kyis dngos grub kyi ye shes bsgrub par bya'o zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: Now, in order to teach that those who have obtained the initiation and the commitments in the single-seal maṇḍala of Loktrāṇā should accomplish the gnosis of spiritual powers,

original: 'gro ba 'dul ba'i ye shes bslab po zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: 'gro ba 'dul ba'i ye shes bslab po zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: [the Bhagavān] declares, “Train in the gnosis of Loktrāṇā.”

original: 'gro ba 'dul ba ni bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug go //
analyzed: 'gro ba 'dul ba ni bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug go //
translated: Loktrāṇā is the Bhagavān Ārya Avalokiteśvara.

original: der nges pa'i ye shes de bslab pa'o //
analyzed: der nges pa'i ye shes de bslab pa'o //
translated: One should train in that gnosis ascertained in him.

original: 'gro ba 'dul ba'i zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: 'gro ba 'dul ba'i zhes bya ba ni /
translated: As for “Loktrāṇā,”

original: dkyil 'khor legs par bris nas kyang //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor legs par bris nas kyang //
translated: having well drawn the maṇḍala,

original: zhes bya ba ni 'gro ba 'dul ba'i phyag rgya gcig pa'i dkyil 'khor bri ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni 'gro ba 'dul ba'i phyag rgya gcig pa'i dkyil 'khor bri ba'o //
translated: This is the drawing of the mandala of the single seal of Subjugation of the Three Worlds.

original: phyag rgya chen po bsgoms na ni //
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po bsgoms na ni //
translated: If one meditates on the great seal,

original: sna tshogs 'chang dang 'dra bar 'gyur //
analyzed: sna tshogs 'chang dang 'dra bar 'gyur //
translated: one will become like the bearer of the various.

original: zhes bya ba ni 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor chen por 'jug pa'i cho ga dang / 'dir slob dpon rang nyid kyi cho ga rjes su spyad la 'gro ba 'dul ba'i phyag rgya chen po bcings te bsgoms na /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor chen por 'jug pa'i cho ga dang / 'dir slob dpon rang nyid kyi cho ga rjes su spyad la 'gro ba 'dul ba'i phyag rgya chen po bcings te bsgoms na /
translated: This is the ritual for entering the great mandala of Subjugation of the Three Worlds, and the ritual for the master himself to perform here, binding the great seal of Subjugation of the Three Worlds and meditating on it,

original: 'gro ba 'dul ba dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'gro ba 'dul ba dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro //
translated: one will become like Subjugation of the Three Worlds.

original: 'di skad ston pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di skad ston pa yin te /
translated: This is what is being taught.

original: 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i cho gas 'gro ba 'dul ba'i rnal 'byor dang / de las bshad pa'i rnal 'byor chen po byas la /
analyzed: 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i cho gas 'gro ba 'dul ba'i rnal 'byor dang / de las bshad pa'i rnal 'byor chen po byas la /
translated: By the ritual explained in the great mandala of Subjugation of the Three Worlds, one should perform the yoga of Subjugation of the Three Worlds and the great yoga explained in that.

original: phyis phyag rgya gcig pa'i dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i sngags dang bshad ma thar pa'i 'gro ba 'dul ba'i snying pos ting nge 'dzin rnam pa gsum ji lta ba bzhin du sgom pa sngon du 'gro bas bskyed la /
analyzed: phyis phyag rgya gcig pa'i dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i sngags dang bshad ma thar pa'i 'gro ba 'dul ba'i snying pos ting nge 'dzin rnam pa gsum ji lta ba bzhin du sgom pa sngon du 'gro bas bskyed la /
translated: Later, having generated the deity through the three meditative stabilizations just as they are explained in the mandala of the single mudra, and having recited the mantras explained there and the essence of the subjugation of beings explained above,

original: nyin re zhing thun bzhi'i sbyor bas thun re re yang ji srid mngon sum du mthong ba de srid kyi bar du bsgom par bya'o ;
analyzed: nyin re zhing thun bzhi'i sbyor bas thun re re yang ji srid mngon sum du mthong ba de srid kyi bar du bsgom par bya'o ;
translated: one should meditate in four sessions each day until one sees the deity directly.

original: / de nas zla ba nya la de'i dkyil 'khor bris nas /
analyzed: / de nas zla ba nya la de'i dkyil 'khor bris nas /
translated: Then, on the full moon, one should draw the mandala of that deity,

original: cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad la /
analyzed: cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad la /
translated: and perform all the rites.

original: bdag la byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa byas te /
analyzed: bdag la byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa byas te /
translated: Having performed the self-consecration and so forth,

original: slob dpon rang nyid kyi ming nas brjod nas rdo rjes bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: slob dpon rang nyid kyi ming nas brjod nas rdo rjes bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: one should accomplish the vajra recitation by reciting one's own name as the master.

original: padma'i slob dpon sems dpa' yi //
analyzed: padma'i slob dpon sems dpa' yi //
translated: The lotus master hero

original: rdo rje lcags kyu bcings nas ni //
analyzed: rdo rje lcags kyu bcings nas ni //
translated: having bound the vajra hook,

original: @89b se gol mang po brdab bgyis la //
analyzed: @89b se gol mang po brdab bgyis la //
translated: having snapped one's fingers many times,

original: sangs rgyas thams cad bsdu bar bya //
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad bsdu bar bya //
translated: one should summon all the buddhas.

original: de nas padma'i sems dpa' yi //
analyzed: de nas padma'i sems dpa' yi //
translated: Then, the lotus hero

original: ming brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa ni //
analyzed: ming brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa ni //
translated: The one hundred and eight names,

original: lan cig rab tu brjod par bgyi //
analyzed: lan cig rab tu brjod par bgyi //
translated: I will recite once.

original: de nas rta mgrin la sogs pa las kyi phyag rgyas bcom ldan 'das dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du bya ba dang / snga ma bzhin du mchod pa dang phyag bya ba'i mthar thug pa'i cho ga rjes su spyad la /
analyzed: de nas rta mgrin la sogs pa las kyi phyag rgyas bcom ldan 'das dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du bya ba dang / snga ma bzhin du mchod pa dang phyag bya ba'i mthar thug pa'i cho ga rjes su spyad la /
translated: Then, with the action seal of Hayagriva, one should summon the Bhagavat, and cause him to enter, bind, and subdue him, and perform the rite of worship and obeisance as before.

original: 'gro ba 'dul ba'i phyag rgya chen po bcings te /
analyzed: 'gro ba 'dul ba'i phyag rgya chen po bcings te /
translated: Form the great seal of Vinayaka,

original: 'gro ba 'dul ba'i phyag rgya gcig pa'i snying po bzlas shing mtshan thog thag bsgom pa byas na /
analyzed: 'gro ba 'dul ba'i phyag rgya gcig pa'i snying po bzlas shing mtshan thog thag bsgom pa byas na /
translated: and meditate all night reciting the essence mantra of Vinayaka's single seal.

original: des 'gro ba 'dul ba dang mtshungs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des 'gro ba 'dul ba dang mtshungs par 'gyur ro //
translated: By that, one will become like Vinayaka.

original: de nas 'gro ba 'dul ba'i gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab par bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de nas 'gro ba 'dul ba'i gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab par bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Then, one should teach the knowledge of the secret seal of Vinayaka.

original: phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab pa'i dus phyis 'gro ba 'dul ba ni 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug go //
analyzed: phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab pa'i dus phyis 'gro ba 'dul ba ni 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug go //
translated: The time for teaching the knowledge of the seal is after, Vinayaka is Avalokitesvara.

original: phyag rgya gcig pa dang / las kyi dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pa dag pa gcig tu gyur par lhag par mos pa'i phyag rgya ni gsang ba'i phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: phyag rgya gcig pa dang / las kyi dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pa dag pa gcig tu gyur par lhag par mos pa'i phyag rgya ni gsang ba'i phyag rgya'o //
translated: The seal of the yoga abiding in the single seal and the action mandala is the secret seal, which is the imagination of the single purity.

original: der nges pa'i ye shes bslab pa ni bstan pa'o //
analyzed: der nges pa'i ye shes bslab pa ni bstan pa'o //
translated: The teaching of the training in the gnosis of that is the teaching.

original: sna tshogs gzugs kyi ting 'dzin dang // mnyam par gzhag pa bsgoms nas kyang //
analyzed: sna tshogs gzugs kyi ting 'dzin dang // mnyam par gzhag pa bsgoms nas kyang //
translated: Having meditated on the meditative stabilization of the various forms,

original: zhes bya ba ni 'gro ba 'dul ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ting nge 'dzin sna tshogs kyi gzugs su de bsgoms pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni 'gro ba 'dul ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ting nge 'dzin sna tshogs kyi gzugs su de bsgoms pa'o //
translated: the meditative stabilization of the various forms is the meditative stabilization of the taming of migrators.

original: legs par mnyam par gzhag pa'i mtshan ma thob nas /
analyzed: legs par mnyam par gzhag pa'i mtshan ma thob nas /
translated: Having attained the sign of good meditative stabilization,

original: dang po gnyis ni sbyar bar bya //
analyzed: dang po gnyis ni sbyar bar bya //
translated: the first two should be joined.

original: zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi sku gang yin pa dang / rnal 'byor pa'i lus gang yin pa gcig tu gyur par lhag par mos pa ni dbang po gnyis mnyam par sbyor ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi sku gang yin pa dang / rnal 'byor pa'i lus gang yin pa gcig tu gyur par lhag par mos pa ni dbang po gnyis mnyam par sbyor ba'o //
translated: The body of the Bhagavat taming migrators mandala and the body of the yogin become one, which is the imagination of the union of the two organs.

original: dkyil 'khor der sngar bshad pa'i tshul gyis byas na /
analyzed: dkyil 'khor der sngar bshad pa'i tshul gyis byas na /
translated: In that mandala, one should do as explained above.

original: rnal 'byor pas myur du dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rnal 'byor pas myur du dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that the yogi will quickly attain power.

original: 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dum bu las bshad pa'i dngos grub thams cad ni 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i rang gi lha'i phyag rgya bzhi po rnams kyis ji lta ba bzhin du rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor byas la bsgrub par bya'o zhes bya
analyzed: 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dum bu las bshad pa'i dngos grub thams cad ni 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i rang gi lha'i phyag rgya bzhi po rnams kyis ji lta ba bzhin du rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor byas la bsgrub par bya'o zhes bya
translated: All powers explained in the chapter on disciplining migrating beings are to be accomplished by means of the four seals of one's deity explained in the great mandala of disciplining migrating beings, having performed the yoga of one's deity just as it is.

original: ba'i don bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: ba'i don bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to teach this meaning,

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: [the Bhagavān] declares thereupon, etc.

original: de nas zhes bya ba ni gsang ba'i ye shes bstan pa'i dus phyis phyag rgya @90a * //
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba ni gsang ba'i ye shes bstan pa'i dus phyis phyag rgya @90a * //
translated: Thereupon means after the time of teaching the secret intuition.

original: chen po la sogs pa phyag rgya bcing ba rnams bslab par bya'o zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya chen po dang por byas pa'i phyag rgya bcing ba gang yin pa'i ni phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i phyag rga bcing ba ste /
analyzed: chen po la sogs pa phyag rgya bcing ba rnams bslab par bya'o zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya chen po dang por byas pa'i phyag rgya bcing ba gang yin pa'i ni phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i phyag rga bcing ba ste /
translated: One should train in the mudras such as the great mudra and so on.🔽

original: de bslab par bya'o //
analyzed: de bslab par bya'o //
translated: One should learn the binding of the great seal and so forth means that one should learn the binding of the great seal and so forth, which are the seals beginning with the great seal.

original: 'di skad ston pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di skad ston pa yin te /
translated: This is what is being taught:🔽The great seal of the Bhagavat, the commitments, the doctrine, and the action seals, which are explained in the Great Mandala of Subjugation of Maras, should be taken up here, and the powers are also like that.

original: 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag rgya chen po dang / dam tshig dang chos dang / las rnams nyid 'dir gzung bar bya'o / dngos grub rnams kyang de bzhin no zhes bya ba ni ji ltar dkyil 'khor chen po phyag chen po la sogs pa'i dngos grub bshad pa de bzhin du 'dir yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag rgya chen po dang / dam tshig dang chos dang / las rnams nyid 'dir gzung bar bya'o / dngos grub rnams kyang de bzhin no zhes bya ba ni ji ltar dkyil 'khor chen po phyag chen po la sogs pa'i dngos grub bshad pa de bzhin du 'dir yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that just as the powers of the great seal and so forth are explained in the Great Mandala, so they are here.

original: ji ltar dkyil 'khor la dngos grub tu 'gyur ba de bzhin du ras sam /
analyzed: ji ltar dkyil 'khor la dngos grub tu 'gyur ba de bzhin du ras sam /
translated: Just as one attains powers in the mandala, so one does on cloth,

original: rtsig pa'am / sku gzugs sam /
analyzed: rtsig pa'am / sku gzugs sam /
translated: on a wall, or on a statue.

original: nam mkha' la brtags pa'i dkyil 'khor la yang dam tshig dang dbang bskur ba dang / phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub tu 'gyur ro zhes bstan pa'i phyir ;
analyzed: nam mkha' la brtags pa'i dkyil 'khor la yang dam tshig dang dbang bskur ba dang / phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub tu 'gyur ro zhes bstan pa'i phyir ;
translated: In order to demonstrate that the maṇḍala that is examined in space also becomes the pledge, empowerment, and the spiritual powers of the great seal,

original: de bzhin du ras la sogs pa yang zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: de bzhin du ras la sogs pa yang zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: he says, “Likewise, on cloth and so forth.”

original: ji ltar phyag rgya gcig pa'i dkyil 'khor du phyag rgya chen po bri ba'i cho ga'i tshul du gsungs pa de bzhin du dam tshig gi phyag rgya chen po bri ba'i cho ga yang shes par bya'o zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: ji ltar phyag rgya gcig pa'i dkyil 'khor du phyag rgya chen po bri ba'i cho ga'i tshul du gsungs pa de bzhin du dam tshig gi phyag rgya chen po bri ba'i cho ga yang shes par bya'o zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: Just as the procedure for drawing the great seal in the maṇḍala of the single seal is taught, so too should one understand the procedure for drawing the great pledge seal.

original: phyag rgya gzhan rnams kyang phyag rgya gcig pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshul gyis de bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: phyag rgya gzhan rnams kyang phyag rgya gcig pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshul gyis de bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni /
translated: In order to demonstrate that, he says, “The other seals are also accomplished in the same way by the procedure of the single seal maṇḍala.”

original: phyag rgya gcig pa'i dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i dngos grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: phyag rgya gcig pa'i dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i dngos grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: This means that all the spiritual powers that are explained in the single seal maṇḍala are accomplished.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The Dharma of all the Tathagatas is the perfection of wisdom.

original: de'i dam tshig ni padma'i rigs ston par byed pa'i sgra'i tshogs la yang ming thams cad kyi de kho na nyid bsdus pa'i 'grel pa //
analyzed: de'i dam tshig ni padma'i rigs ston par byed pa'i sgra'i tshogs la yang ming thams cad kyi de kho na nyid bsdus pa'i 'grel pa //
translated: Its commitment is the collection of sounds that reveal the Lotus family, and also the commentary on the compendium of all the realities of names.

original: de kho na / chen po yang yin la rtog pa yang de yin pas na rtog pa chen po'o //
analyzed: de kho na / chen po yang yin la rtog pa yang de yin pas na rtog pa chen po'o //
translated: It is the great imagination, because it is the great reality and also the imagination.

original: de gzhan las khyad par du gyur pas rgyal ; po ste mdzes shing 'bar ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de gzhan las khyad par du gyur pas rgyal ; po ste mdzes shing 'bar ba'i phyir ro //
translated: It is the king, because it is superior to others, and it is beautiful and shining.

original: rdzogs so zhes bya ba ni rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi mthar thug pa'o //
analyzed: rdzogs so zhes bya ba ni rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi mthar thug pa'o //
translated: It is complete, because it is the end of the root tantra.

original: padma'i rigs 'di thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos las byung ba rgyu la 'bras bu btags nas chos kyi phyag rgya zhes brjod do //
analyzed: padma'i rigs 'di thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos las byung ba rgyu la 'bras bu btags nas chos kyi phyag rgya zhes brjod do //
translated: This entire Lotus family is born from the Dharma of the perfection of wisdom, and it is called the Dharma seal, figuratively designating the cause with the result.

original: de skad du yang /
analyzed: de skad du yang /
translated: Thus it is said:

original: so sor rtog pa'i 'gro ba kun //
analyzed: so sor rtog pa'i 'gro ba kun //
translated: All the beings to be understood

original: gti mug rgya mtsho las bsgral phyir //
analyzed: gti mug rgya mtsho las bsgral phyir //
translated: are liberated from the ocean of delusion.

original: blo ldan @90b 'jig rten dbang phyug gis //
analyzed: blo ldan @90b 'jig rten dbang phyug gis //
translated: The wise Lord of the World

original: rtog pa'i rgyal po 'di gsung so //
analyzed: rtog pa'i rgyal po 'di gsung so //
translated: has spoken this king of realizations.

original: zhes bya ba 'di gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba 'di gsungs pa yin no //
translated: This is what he has said.

original: rnam dag chos ni rtogs bya'i phyir //
analyzed: rnam dag chos ni rtogs bya'i phyir //
translated: In order to realize the pure Dharma,

original: dri ma med pa de nyid ni //
analyzed: dri ma med pa de nyid ni //
translated: that stainless reality

original: snang byed dge ba 'di bshad las //
analyzed: snang byed dge ba 'di bshad las //
translated: is explained in this illuminating virtue.

original: bdag gis bsod nams gang bsags pa //
analyzed: bdag gis bsod nams gang bsags pa //
translated: Whatever merit I have accumulated

original: de yis 'jig rten ma lus pa//
analyzed: de yis 'jig rten ma lus pa//
translated: by that, may the entire world

original: snying rje las byung kun dga' che //
analyzed: snying rje las byung kun dga' che //
translated: attain the great joy arising from compassion,

original: snying po bsam mi khyab chen gtso //
analyzed: snying po bsam mi khyab chen gtso //
translated: the essence of the inconceivable great chief,🔽born from the lotus, be victorious.

original: padma las byung rgyal gyur cig / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid bsdus pa'i 'grel pa /
analyzed: padma las byung rgyal gyur cig / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid bsdus pa'i 'grel pa /
translated: The commentary on the Compendium of Principles of All Tathāgatas,

original: de kho na nyid snang bar byed pa zhes bya ba padma'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi 'grel pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: de kho na nyid snang bar byed pa zhes bya ba padma'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi 'grel pa rdzogs so /
translated: called Illuminating Reality, the commentary on the lotus family maṇḍala, is complete.

original: // / de ltar log par lta ba'i gnyen por gyur pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chos kyi phyag rgya'i rang bzhin padma'i rigs bstan nas /
analyzed: // / de ltar log par lta ba'i gnyen por gyur pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chos kyi phyag rgya'i rang bzhin padma'i rigs bstan nas /
translated: Thus, having taught the lotus family, which has the nature of the Dharma mudrā of the perfection of wisdom, the antidote to wrong views,

original: da ni ser sna can gyi gnyen por gyur pa /
analyzed: da ni ser sna can gyi gnyen por gyur pa /
translated: Now, [the section on] the jewel clan, which is the antidote for the stingy,

original: sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa'i las yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i nor bu'i rigs ni /
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa'i las yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i nor bu'i rigs ni /
translated: is the fulfillment of the wishes of all sentient beings.

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: [The Bhagavān] declares the jewel clan, beginning with “then.”

original: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni de ma thag pa ste /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni de ma thag pa ste /
translated: The word “then” [means] immediately,

original: dang por sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rjes thogs la zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: dang por sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rjes thogs la zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: [meaning] “after the first application samādhi.”

original: 'dir dang po sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni /
analyzed: 'dir dang po sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni /
translated: Here, the first application samādhi

original: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i dang po sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi steng du rdo rje sems dpa' dang / rdo rje rin chen dang / rdo rje chos dang / rdo rje las sprul pa'i mthar thug pa yin par shes par bya'o zhes bya ba de dag 'dir bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i dang po sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi steng du rdo rje sems dpa' dang / rdo rje rin chen dang / rdo rje chos dang / rdo rje las sprul pa'i mthar thug pa yin par shes par bya'o zhes bya ba de dag 'dir bshad pa yin no //
translated: is the first application samādhi explained in the Great Vajra Realm Mandala, and one should understand that it is the ultimate emanation of Vajrasattva, Vajraratna, Vajradharma, and Vajrakarman.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa'i rnam par snang mdzad dang / mi bskyod pa dang / rin chen 'byung ldan dang ; 'od dpag tu med pa dang / don yod par grub pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa'i rnam par snang mdzad dang / mi bskyod pa dang / rin chen 'byung ldan dang ; 'od dpag tu med pa dang / don yod par grub pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The Tathagatas are Vairocana, Akshobhya, Ratnasambhava, Amitabha, Amoghasiddhi, and so on, equal to the number of atoms in all world-realms.

original: yang de zhin gshegs pa thams cad gcig tu 'dus nas zhes bya ba la yang gi sgra ni zlos pa'i don to //
analyzed: yang de zhin gshegs pa thams cad gcig tu 'dus nas zhes bya ba la yang gi sgra ni zlos pa'i don to //
translated: And also, having gathered together all the Tathagatas, the word also means again.

original: sngar ni 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la legs so zhes bya ba byin nas /
analyzed: sngar ni 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la legs so zhes bya ba byin nas /
translated: Previously, having given the word of praise to the noble Avalokiteshvara,

original: gcig tu 'dus par mdzad pa yin la de ltar ni nam mkha'i snying po la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas gsol ba gdab pa'i phyir /
analyzed: gcig tu 'dus par mdzad pa yin la de ltar ni nam mkha'i snying po la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas gsol ba gdab pa'i phyir /
translated: they gathered together. In the same way, for the sake of supplicating Akashagarbha with the one hundred and eight names,

original: gcig tu tshogs shing 'dus par byas pa yin no //
analyzed: gcig tu tshogs shing 'dus par byas pa yin no //
translated: they assembled and gathered together.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dbang bskur ba ni rin po che'i rigs su de'i rgyu yin pas rin po che bskyed par mdzad pa yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dbang bskur ba ni rin po che'i rigs su de'i rgyu yin pas rin po che bskyed par mdzad pa yin no //
translated: The consecration of all Tathagatas is the cause of the jewel family, so they generate the jewel.

original: gang gi phyir @91a * //
analyzed: gang gi phyir @91a * //
translated: For what reason?

original: 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'i thugs las rigs thams cad 'dir bskyed par mdzad pa yin no //
analyzed: 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'i thugs las rigs thams cad 'dir bskyed par mdzad pa yin no //
translated: Because the noble Akashagarbha is the one who generates all the clans here.

original: rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka na gnas pa'i sems dpa' rdo rje'o //🔽byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka na gnas pa'i sems dpa' rdo rje'o // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po zhes bya ba ni /
translated: That very Vajra Holder is the Vajrasattva who resides in the hearts of all Tathagatas.🔽The noble Akashagarbha, the Bodhisattva Mahasattva, is the one who holds the form of the noble Akashagarbha Bodhisattva Mahasattva.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'i gzugs 'dzin pa la 'chad par 'gyur ba'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa 'dis gsol ba btab pa ci'i don du gnyer ba yin no //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'i gzugs 'dzin pa la 'chad par 'gyur ba'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa 'dis gsol ba btab pa ci'i don du gnyer ba yin no //
translated: He is the one who makes requests with the one hundred and eight names that will be explained. For what purpose?

original: don du gnyer ba'i rgyu yod pa'i gsol ba 'debs pa'i phyir ldan par bshad do //
analyzed: don du gnyer ba'i rgyu yod pa'i gsol ba 'debs pa'i phyir ldan par bshad do //
translated: Because he makes requests for the sake of having a purpose, it is explained as being endowed.

original: nam mkha'i snying po zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: nam mkha'i snying po zhes bya ba ni /
translated: As for Akashagarbha,

original: de la nam mkha'i sgras ni 'dir rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyag na gnas pa'i rdo rje rin po che las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bskyed par brjod pa yin te /
analyzed: de la nam mkha'i sgras ni 'dir rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyag na gnas pa'i rdo rje rin po che las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bskyed par brjod pa yin te /
translated: The word “sky” here refers to the vajra-jewel held in the hand of Vairocana, from which all the Tathagatas are generated.

original: nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes las byung ba nam mkha' yang yin la snying po yang 'di yin pas na nam mkha'i snying pos te de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams byang chub sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying pos bskyed pa yin no //
analyzed: nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes las byung ba nam mkha' yang yin la snying po yang 'di yin pas na nam mkha'i snying pos te de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams byang chub sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying pos bskyed pa yin no //
translated: Since it is the sky, i.e., the wisdom of equality with space, and it is the essence, i.e., the essence of the sky, it is the “sky essence,” i.e., the Tathagatas generated by the great bodhisattva Akasagarbha.

original: sems can don zhes bya ba ni sems can gyi don du gnyer bas na sems can don no //
analyzed: sems can don zhes bya ba ni sems can gyi don du gnyer bas na sems can don no //
translated: “For the sake of sentient beings” means “for the sake of sentient beings.”

original: sems dpa' chen po zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: sems dpa' chen po zhes bya ba ni /
translated: “Great being” means

original: sems dpa' yang yin la chen po yang de yin pas sems dpa' chen po ste /
analyzed: sems dpa' yang yin la chen po yang de yin pas sems dpa' chen po ste /
translated: that he is a being and he is great, thus he is a great being.

original: byang chub kyi sems kyi rang bzhin gyis thams cad du khyab pa'o zhes bya ba'i don yin no //
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems kyi rang bzhin gyis thams cad du khyab pa'o zhes bya ba'i don yin no //
translated: The meaning is that he pervades everything with the nature of the thought of awakening.

original: gzi brjid chen po zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: gzi brjid chen po zhes bya ba ni /
translated: “Great splendor” means

original: gzi brjid chen po 'di la mnga' bas na gzi brjid chen po ste /
analyzed: gzi brjid chen po 'di la mnga' bas na gzi brjid chen po ste /
translated: He is the Great Splendor because he possesses this great splendor.

original: mdangs dang ldan pa'i gzi brjid kyis nam mkha' thams cad khyab pa'o //
analyzed: mdangs dang ldan pa'i gzi brjid kyis nam mkha' thams cad khyab pa'o //
translated: He is the Splendor because he pervades the entire sky with the splendor of his radiance.

original: rin po che chen po ni rdo rje rin chen gyi gzugs kyis nam mkha' khyab pas na rin po che'o //
analyzed: rin po che chen po ni rdo rje rin chen gyi gzugs kyis nam mkha' khyab pas na rin po che'o //
translated: He is the Great Jewel because he pervades the sky with the form of the great jewel, the vajra gem.

original: rin chen mchog ni rin po che bzang po rnams las kyang chos bzang ba'i rin po che'o //
analyzed: rin chen mchog ni rin po che bzang po rnams las kyang chos bzang ba'i rin po che'o //
translated: He is the Best Jewel because he is the jewel of the good Dharma, which is better than all the good jewels.

original: rin po ches mtshan pa la sogs pa'i mtshan ma'i rang bzhin de dag las gtso bo mchog yin te /
analyzed: rin po ches mtshan pa la sogs pa'i mtshan ma'i rang bzhin de dag las gtso bo mchog yin te /
translated: He is the Foremost Jewel because he is the chief among those whose nature is the marks of the jewel, etc.

original: rigs kyi bdag po'i mtshan ma'i gzugs yin pa'i phyir ro //🔽rdo rje rin chen zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: rigs kyi bdag po'i mtshan ma'i gzugs yin pa'i phyir ro // rdo rje rin chen zhes bya ba ni /
translated: He is the Jewel Lord because he is the form of the mark of the lord of the family.🔽The Jewel Vajra is the wish-fulfilling gem marked with a five-pronged vajra.

original: rdo rje rtse lnga pas mtshan pa'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu ni rdo rje rin chen te mtshan bdun no //🔽dbang bskur byin zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: rdo rje rtse lnga pas mtshan pa'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu ni rdo rje rin chen te mtshan bdun no // dbang bskur byin zhes bya ba ni /
translated: He is the One Who Bestows Empowerment because he bestows the empowerment of the great vajra gem.

original: rin po che'i rigs kyi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rin po che'i rigs kyi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: He is the One Who Bestows the Great Empowerment because he bestows the empowerment of the great jewel family.

original: @91b rin chen zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: @91b rin chen zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The “jewel” is

original: rin po che'i rigs des nam mkha' khyab pa'o //
analyzed: rin po che'i rigs des nam mkha' khyab pa'o //
translated: the jewel family, which pervades space.

original: dag pa che zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: dag pa che zhes bya ba ni /
translated: “Great purity” is

original: rin po che'i rigs kyi gzugs des bag chags dang bcas pa'i nyon mongs pa'i dri ma 'khrud pa'i phyir dag pa che'o //
analyzed: rin po che'i rigs kyi gzugs des bag chags dang bcas pa'i nyon mongs pa'i dri ma 'khrud pa'i phyir dag pa che'o //
translated: great purity because that form of the jewel family washes away the stains of the afflictions together with their traces.🔽“Great virtue” is

original: dge ba che zhes bya ba ni rnam par thar pa'i rang bzhin yin pas na dag pa che'o //
analyzed: dge ba che zhes bya ba ni rnam par thar pa'i rang bzhin yin pas na dag pa che'o //
translated: great purity because it is the nature of liberation.

original: sangs rgyas rin chen zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: sangs rgyas rin chen zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The “jewel of the buddhas” is

original: rin po che'i rigs des dbang bskur ba'i ngo bo ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams las gzhan na med pa'i phyir sangs rgyas rin chen zhes brjod do //
analyzed: rin po che'i rigs des dbang bskur ba'i ngo bo ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams las gzhan na med pa'i phyir sangs rgyas rin chen zhes brjod do //
translated: the jewel of the buddhas because the essence of the consecration by that jewel family is not elsewhere than the blessed buddhas.

original: rnam dag sku zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: rnam dag sku zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The “pure body” is

original: lus la dri ma mi mnga' bas na rnam dag sku'o //
analyzed: lus la dri ma mi mnga' bas na rnam dag sku'o //
translated: the pure body because it is not sullied by the body.

original: rin chen rin chen zhes bya ba ni ;
analyzed: rin chen rin chen zhes bya ba ni ;
translated: The “jewel jewel” is

original: nam mkha'i snying po'i phyag na gnas pa ste mtshan bdun yin no //
analyzed: nam mkha'i snying po'i phyag na gnas pa ste mtshan bdun yin no //
translated: the jewel jewel because it is held in the hand of Ākāśagarbha. These are the seven epithets.🔽“Space” is

original: nam mkha' zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: nam mkha' zhes bya ba ni /
translated: the space element.

original: nam mkha'i 'od zer gyi gzugs kyis spro ba'i phyir nam mkha'o //
analyzed: nam mkha'i 'od zer gyi gzugs kyis spro ba'i phyir nam mkha'o //
translated: It is space because it radiates in the form of light rays of space.

original: nam mkha' las byung zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: nam mkha' las byung zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Arisen from space means

original: nam mkha'i 'od zer dang gcig tu gyur nas /
analyzed: nam mkha'i 'od zer dang gcig tu gyur nas /
translated: having become one with the light rays of space.

original: rdo rje rin chen bskyed pa'i phyir nam mkha' las byung ba'o //
analyzed: rdo rje rin chen bskyed pa'i phyir nam mkha' las byung ba'o //

original: theg pa chen po'i tshul gyis rang bzhin no //
