translated: is the nature of the Great Vehicle.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba ni bden pa gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba ni bden pa gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The word “tathāgata” is because he speaks the truth.

original: sems dpa' che zhes bya ba ni chos bdag med pa'i ngo bos thams cad de bzhin du rtogs pa'i phyir sems dpa' che'o //
analyzed: sems dpa' che zhes bya ba ni chos bdag med pa'i ngo bos thams cad de bzhin du rtogs pa'i phyir sems dpa' che'o //
translated: The word “great being” is because he is a great being who realizes everything as it is by the nature of the selflessness of phenomena.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kun te mtshan bdun yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kun te mtshan bdun yin no //
translated: He is all the buddhas because he is the nature of the five tathāgatas. These are the seven epithets.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The tathāgata is called “jewel”

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dbang bskur ba'i rin po che chen po yin pa'i phyir /🔽de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dbang bskur ba'i rin po che chen po yin pa'i phyir / de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'o //
translated: because he is the great jewel of consecration of all tathāgatas.🔽He is the tathāgata jewel.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa 'od po che //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa 'od po che //
translated: The tathāgata is called “great light”🔽because he is the great light of the Dharma of all tathāgatas.

original: zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'od chen po mnga' ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od chen po'o //🔽de bzhin gshegs pa'i dpal chen po zhes bya ba ni /🔽de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bsam pa'i rgyal po'i dpal chen po'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'od chen po mnga' ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od chen po'o // de bzhin gshegs pa'i dpal chen po zhes bya ba ni / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bsam pa'i rgyal po'i dpal chen po'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir /
translated: The great light of the Tathagatas is the great light of the sun-discs of all the Tathagatas.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i dpal chen po'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i dpal chen po'o //
translated: The great glory of the Tathagatas is the great glory of the king of wishes of all the Tathagatas.

original: bzhad chen po zhes bya ba ni rdo rje bzhad pas nam mkha' thams cad khyab par bzhad pa chen po ste mtshan bzhi yin no //
analyzed: bzhad chen po zhes bya ba ni rdo rje bzhad pas nam mkha' thams cad khyab par bzhad pa chen po ste mtshan bzhi yin no //
translated: The great laughter is the great laughter which pervades the whole of space with the vajra laughter.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa dbang bskur mchog / ces bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rin po che'i cod pan gyi ngo bos gnas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dbang bskur mchog / ces bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rin po che'i cod pan gyi ngo bos gnas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The supreme consecration of the Tathagatas is the consecration of the crown of jewels of all the Tathagatas.

original: mchog ces bya ba ni dbang bskur ba de nyid gzhan las khyad par du gyur pa'i phyir mchog go //
analyzed: mchog ces bya ba ni dbang bskur ba de nyid gzhan las khyad par du gyur pa'i phyir mchog go //
translated: Supreme means that it is supreme because it is superior to the others.

original: dbang chen zhes bya ba ni dbang yang yin la chen po yang 'di yin pas @93b dbang chen te /
analyzed: dbang chen zhes bya ba ni dbang yang yin la chen po yang 'di yin pas @93b dbang chen te /
translated: The great empowerment is the empowerment and it is great, thus it is the great empowerment.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba'i ngo bo nyid kyis sa 'og ma rnams kyi dbang bskur las khyad par du gyur pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba'i ngo bo nyid kyis sa 'og ma rnams kyi dbang bskur las khyad par du gyur pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is the great empowerment because it is the essence of the empowerment of all the Tathagatas, and it is superior to the empowerment of the lower stages.

original: khyab bdag chen po ste zhes bya ba ni thams cad la khyab pa'i phyir khyab bdag che'o //
analyzed: khyab bdag chen po ste zhes bya ba ni thams cad la khyab pa'i phyir khyab bdag che'o //
translated: The great lord is great because it pervades everything.

original: 'jig rten mgon zhes bya ba ni sems can dang snod kyi 'jig rten du bskal ba sreg pa'i dus su skyob pa mdzad pas na 'jig rten mgon po'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten mgon zhes bya ba ni sems can dang snod kyi 'jig rten du bskal ba sreg pa'i dus su skyob pa mdzad pas na 'jig rten mgon po'o //
translated: The protector of the world is the protector of the world because it protects the world of sentient beings and the world of the vessel at the time of the burning of the eon.

original: rab 'jig rten zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten bzang po ni rab kyi 'jig rten te /
analyzed: rab 'jig rten zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten bzang po ni rab kyi 'jig rten te /
translated: The good world is the good world.

original: rnam par dag pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rang bzhin du gnas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam par dag pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rang bzhin du gnas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is the supreme world because it is the nature of the pure buddha field.

original: mchog ces bya ba ni /
analyzed: mchog ces bya ba ni /
translated: The supreme is the supreme.

original: nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing khams las de nyid gtso bor gyur pas na mchog go //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing khams las de nyid gtso bor gyur pas na mchog go //
translated: The Buddha-field is supreme because it is the principal one among the Buddha-fields that are not free from the afflictions.

original: 'jig rten nyi ma zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: 'jig rten nyi ma zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The Sun of the World is so called

original: nyon mongs pa rnam par dag pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du snang bar byed pas na 'jig rten nyi ma ste mtshan brgyad yin no //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa rnam par dag pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du snang bar byed pas na 'jig rten nyi ma ste mtshan brgyad yin no //
translated: because it illuminates the Buddha-field that is free from the afflictions.

original: rin chen phul te zhes bya ba ni rin po che thams cad kyi nang na shin tu khyad par du gyur pa ste rin chen phul lo ;
analyzed: rin chen phul te zhes bya ba ni rin po che thams cad kyi nang na shin tu khyad par du gyur pa ste rin chen phul lo ;
translated: The Best of Jewels is so called because it is the most excellent of all jewels.

original: / rab kyi mchog ces bya ba ni /
analyzed: / rab kyi mchog ces bya ba ni /
translated: The Best of the Best is so called

original: gtso bo las kyang shin tu gtso bo yin pas na rab mchog go //🔽rin chen rgyan zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: gtso bo las kyang shin tu gtso bo yin pas na rab mchog go // rin chen rgyan zhes bya ba ni /
translated: because it is the best of the best.

original: rin po che'i rgyan 'di las mnga' bas na rin chen rgyan no //
analyzed: rin po che'i rgyan 'di las mnga' bas na rin chen rgyan no //
translated: The Jewel Ornament is so called because it possesses this jewel ornament.

original: rin chen mdzad ces bya ba ni rin po che 'chang ba'o //
analyzed: rin chen mdzad ces bya ba ni rin po che 'chang ba'o //
translated: The Jewel Doer is so called because it holds the jewel.

original: rin chen snang ba zhes bya ba ni rin po che snang ba 'di la mnga' bas na snang ba'o ;
analyzed: rin chen snang ba zhes bya ba ni rin po che snang ba 'di la mnga' bas na snang ba'o ;
translated: The Jewel Light is so called because it possesses this jewel light.

original: / snang ba che zhes bya ba ni chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyis 'jig rten thams cad la khyab pas na snang ba che'o //🔽rin chen grags zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: / snang ba che zhes bya ba ni chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyis 'jig rten thams cad la khyab pas na snang ba che'o // rin chen grags zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Great Light means that because the wisdom of the Dharma realm pervades all worlds, it is Great Light.

original: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du khyab pa'i snyan pa dang / rnyed pa bzang po'i rin po che mnga' bas rin chen grags pa ste mtshan bdun no //
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du khyab pa'i snyan pa dang / rnyed pa bzang po'i rin po che mnga' bas rin chen grags pa ste mtshan bdun no //
translated: Famous Jewel means that because it pervades all world systems with fame and possesses the jewel of excellent attainment, it is Famous Jewel. These are the seven names.

original: rin chen phung po zhes bya ba ni rin po che byur bur spungs pa dang 'dra bas na /
analyzed: rin chen phung po zhes bya ba ni rin po che byur bur spungs pa dang 'dra bas na /
translated: Jewel Heap means that because it is like a heap of jewels,

original: rin po che bzang po ste /
analyzed: rin po che bzang po ste /
translated: it is an excellent jewel.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi rin po che de rnams de las skyes pa'i phyir rin po che'i phung po'o //
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi rin po che de rnams de las skyes pa'i phyir rin po che'i phung po'o //
translated: Because those jewels of the seven factors of enlightenment are born from it, it is a Jewel Heap.

original: rin chen 'byung ldan zhes bya ba ni /🔽rin po che las byung bas na rin chen 'byung ldan no //
analyzed: rin chen 'byung ldan zhes bya ba ni / rin po che las byung bas na rin chen 'byung ldan no //
translated: Jewel Possessor means that🔽because it arises from jewels, it is Jewel Possessor.

original: nor bu'i gzugs dang ldan pa'i phyir nor bu'o //
analyzed: nor bu'i gzugs dang ldan pa'i phyir nor bu'o //
translated: Because it possesses the form of a jewel, it is a Jewel.

original: rdo rje nor bu zhes bya ba ni rdo rje rtse lnga pas mtshan pa'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i gzugs yin pa'i rdo rje nor bu'o //
analyzed: rdo rje nor bu zhes bya ba ni rdo rje rtse lnga pas mtshan pa'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i gzugs yin pa'i rdo rje nor bu'o //
translated: The “vajra gem” is the gem-shaped vajra marked with a five-pronged vajra.

original: yon tan zhes bya ba ni bslab par bya bas yon tan te /
analyzed: yon tan zhes bya ba ni bslab par bya bas yon tan te /
translated: “ Virtue” is the virtue to be trained in.

original: dpal du gyur par bya ba'i don du goms par bya zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //🔽rin chen 'byung ba zhes bya @94a * //🔽ba ni byang chub kyi yan lag la sogs pa rin po che thams cad de las skyes pas na /
analyzed: dpal du gyur par bya ba'i don du goms par bya zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // rin chen 'byung ba zhes bya @94a * // ba ni byang chub kyi yan lag la sogs pa rin po che thams cad de las skyes pas na /
translated: It is to be cultivated for the sake of becoming glorious.

original: rin chen 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: rin chen 'byung ba'o //
translated: The “source of jewels” is the source of all jewels such as the branches of enlightenment, because they are born from it.

original: sku rab 'bar zhes bya ba ni /🔽shin tu 'bar ba'i sku mnga' bas na sku 'bar te /
analyzed: sku rab 'bar zhes bya ba ni / shin tu 'bar ba'i sku mnga' bas na sku 'bar te /
translated: “ Blazing body” is the blazing body,🔽because it possesses a very blazing body.

original: gzi brjid 'bar bas gsal bar byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzi brjid 'bar bas gsal bar byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is radiant because it shines with blazing splendor.

original: rin chen kun zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa thams cad la dkon pa yin pa'i phyir rin chen kun te mtshan brgyad yin no //
analyzed: rin chen kun zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa thams cad la dkon pa yin pa'i phyir rin chen kun te mtshan brgyad yin no //
translated: “ All jewels” are all the mundane and supramundane jewels, because they are rare.

original: che nyid ces bya ba ni bdag nyid chen po'i rang bzhin yin pas na che nyid de /
analyzed: che nyid ces bya ba ni bdag nyid chen po'i rang bzhin yin pas na che nyid de /
translated: Greatness is the nature of greatness, and so it is great.

original: sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rjes nam mkha' khyab pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rjes nam mkha' khyab pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because of the vajra body, speech, and mind that pervades space.

original: shing sde zhes bya ba ni mchod sdong bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dmigs pa yin pa'i phyir shing ngo //
analyzed: shing sde zhes bya ba ni mchod sdong bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dmigs pa yin pa'i phyir shing ngo //
translated: The tree is a tree because it is the object of observation of bodhisattvas, like a sacrificial post.

original: rin chen dbang zhes bya ba ni rin po che thams cad kyi gtso bor gyur pa'i phyir rin chen dbang ngo //
analyzed: rin chen dbang zhes bya ba ni rin po che thams cad kyi gtso bor gyur pa'i phyir rin chen dbang ngo //
translated: The jewel lord is the jewel lord because it is the chief of all jewels.

original: re ba thams cad skong mdzad pa //🔽zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: re ba thams cad skong mdzad pa // zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Fulfiller of all wishes is

original: sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pas na re ba thams cad skong mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pas na re ba thams cad skong mdzad pa'o //
translated: because it fulfills the wishes of all sentient beings.

original: bsam pa thams cad legs par brnyes //
analyzed: bsam pa thams cad legs par brnyes //
translated: All wishes well obtained is

original: zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa'i dngos grub thams cad brnyes pa'i ngo bo yin pa'i phyir /🔽bsam pa thams cad legs par brnyes so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa'i dngos grub thams cad brnyes pa'i ngo bo yin pa'i phyir / bsam pa thams cad legs par brnyes so //
translated: because it is the nature of obtaining all desired powers.

original: rin chen phung po zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: rin chen phung po zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The jewel heap is🔽 because it is the heap of all jewels.

original: gzhal du med pa'i rin po che thams cad kyi byur bur gyur ba'i phyir rin chen phung po ste mtshan drug yin no //🔽'od mchog ces bya ba ni /
analyzed: gzhal du med pa'i rin po che thams cad kyi byur bur gyur ba'i phyir rin chen phung po ste mtshan drug yin no // 'od mchog ces bya ba ni /
translated: The heap of jewels is so called because it is a heap of all the immeasurable jewels.

original: 'od zer gyi mchog de'i rtse mor gyur ba ni 'od zer mchog go //
analyzed: 'od zer gyi mchog de'i rtse mor gyur ba ni 'od zer mchog go //
translated: The supreme light is so called because it is the summit of all lights.

original: khyab pa zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i ngo bos sems can thams cad kyi rgyud kyi rjes su song ba'i phyir khyab pa'o //
analyzed: khyab pa zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i ngo bos sems can thams cad kyi rgyud kyi rjes su song ba'i phyir khyab pa'o //
translated: The pervading is so called because it pervades the stream of consciousness of all sentient beings by the nature of the essence of the Tathagata.

original: bdag nyid kun zhes bya ba ni sems can thams cad kyi sems dang sems las phyung ba'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir bdag nyid kun no //🔽mchog rab sbyin zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: bdag nyid kun zhes bya ba ni sems can thams cad kyi sems dang sems las phyung ba'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir bdag nyid kun no // mchog rab sbyin zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The all-nature is so called because it is the nature of the mind and mental factors of all sentient beings.

original: rnal 'byor pa mngon par 'dod pas bsgrub pa'i dus su mchog ster bas na mchog rab sbyin no //
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa mngon par 'dod pas bsgrub pa'i dus su mchog ster bas na mchog rab sbyin no //
translated: The bestower of the supreme gift is so called because it bestows the supreme gift at the time of the accomplishment desired by the yogi.

original: mchog che ba zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: mchog che ba zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The great supreme is so called because it is the supreme of all.

original: rin po che'i rig pa 'dzin pa la sogs pa'i khyad par du phun sum tshogs pas na mchog che'o //
analyzed: rin po che'i rig pa 'dzin pa la sogs pa'i khyad par du phun sum tshogs pas na mchog che'o //
translated: It is the great supreme, because it is endowed with the excellence of being a precious vidyadhara, and so forth.

original: phun sum thams cad 'byor pa'o //
analyzed: phun sum thams cad 'byor pa'o //
translated: It is the endowment of all excellences.

original: zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni /
translated: This is

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rin po che'i rigs thams cad ma tshang ba med pa'i ngo bo yin pa'i phyir phun sum tshogs pa thams cad 'byor pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rin po che'i rigs thams cad ma tshang ba med pa'i ngo bo yin pa'i phyir phun sum tshogs pa thams cad 'byor pa'o //
translated: because it is the essence of the non-deficient totality of all the precious families of all the Tathagatas.

original: rdo rje snying po ni rdo rje rtse lnga pas mtshan pa'i @94b yid bzhin nor bu rin po che'i snying po'i skye gnas 'di la mnga' bas na rdo rje snying po'o //
analyzed: rdo rje snying po ni rdo rje rtse lnga pas mtshan pa'i @94b yid bzhin nor bu rin po che'i snying po'i skye gnas 'di la mnga' bas na rdo rje snying po'o //
translated: It is the vajra essence, because it possesses this vajra-marked five-pronged vajra essence of the precious wish-fulfilling gem.

original: gang gi phyir dkyil 'khor bsgrub pa dang phyag rgya chen po bsgrub pas mngon par byang chub pa mngon sum du byed pa'i dus su 'di rdo rje rin chen las skye bar bzhed pa yin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir dkyil 'khor bsgrub pa dang phyag rgya chen po bsgrub pas mngon par byang chub pa mngon sum du byed pa'i dus su 'di rdo rje rin chen las skye bar bzhed pa yin no //
translated: Because it is accepted that this [vajra] is produced from the precious vajra at the time of manifesting manifest enlightenment through the accomplishment of the mandala and the accomplishment of the great seal.

original: de'i phyir rdo rje rin po che'i skye gnas la rdo rje snying po zhes brjod de mtshan brgyad yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir rdo rje rin po che'i skye gnas la rdo rje snying po zhes brjod de mtshan brgyad yin no //
translated: Therefore, the abode of the vajra gem is called the vajra essence, and is the eighth name.

original: da ni mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad 'dzin pa'i phan yon bstan pa ni /
analyzed: da ni mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad 'dzin pa'i phan yon bstan pa ni /
translated: Now, the benefits of holding the one hundred and eight names are taught.

original: su yang rung bas zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
analyzed: su yang rung bas zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
translated: It is said, Whoever... and so on.

original: zhi ba 'di zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhi ba 'di zhes bya ba ni /
translated: This peace is

original: mya ngan las 'das pa thob pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mya ngan las 'das pa thob pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: the cause of attaining nirvana.

original: sangs rgyas kun gyis dbang bskur ba //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyis dbang bskur ba //
translated: Empowered by all the buddhas,

original: skad cig tu ni sdig med thob ;
analyzed: skad cig tu ni sdig med thob ;
translated: in an instant, one attains the absence of evil.

original: / ming brgya rtsa brgyad kyi gzhung gi don 'dzin pa dang / rtogs pa ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ming gi dbang bskur bas na rin po che'i rigs thob pa ni mngon sum du byed pa'o //
analyzed: / ming brgya rtsa brgyad kyi gzhung gi don 'dzin pa dang / rtogs pa ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ming gi dbang bskur bas na rin po che'i rigs thob pa ni mngon sum du byed pa'o //
translated: Holding the meaning of the text of the one hundred and eight names and realizing them is being empowered by the names of all the buddhas, and attaining the precious family is actualized.

original: sdig pa med pa ni sgrib pa dang bral ba'o //
analyzed: sdig pa med pa ni sgrib pa dang bral ba'o //
translated: The absence of evil is being free from obscurations.

original: gang gi tshe sgrib pa dang bral bar gyur pa de nyid kyi tshe /
analyzed: gang gi tshe sgrib pa dang bral bar gyur pa de nyid kyi tshe /
translated: When one becomes free from obscurations,🔽at that very moment,

original: de nyid skad cig gcig la thob po //
analyzed: de nyid skad cig gcig la thob po //
translated: one attains it.

original: rin chen khyod la gsol ba ni //
analyzed: rin chen khyod la gsol ba ni //
translated: I supplicate you, O Precious One.🔽

original: zhes bya ba ni gsol ba 'debs pa'i don du gnyer ba ste /🔽gus pas sngon du 'gro bas so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni gsol ba 'debs pa'i don du gnyer ba ste / gus pas sngon du 'gro bas so //
translated: The meaning of I request of you, O Jewel is the desire to supplicate.

original: rin chen khyod la zhes bya ba ni bod pa'o //
analyzed: rin chen khyod la zhes bya ba ni bod pa'o //
translated: With devotion as the preliminary, I request of you, O Jewel is the salutation.

original: nor 'dus pa ni bshad pa'i mdzod ces bya ba ni rin po che'i rigs so //
analyzed: nor 'dus pa ni bshad pa'i mdzod ces bya ba ni rin po che'i rigs so //
translated: The accumulation of wealth is the treasury of explanation, which is the jewel family.

original: de nyid kyi rnam par 'grel pa ni /
analyzed: de nyid kyi rnam par 'grel pa ni /
translated: The commentary on that is:

original: sangs rgyas kun gyi dbang bskur mchog / rang gi rigs ni bskyed par mdzod //🔽ces bya ba ni /🔽sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba ni /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyi dbang bskur mchog / rang gi rigs ni bskyed par mdzod // ces bya ba ni / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba ni /
translated: Bestow the supreme consecration of all the Buddhas, and generate my own family.

original: sangs rgyas nyid kyis dbang bskur ba'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas nyid kyis dbang bskur ba'o //
translated: The consecration of all the Buddhas is the consecration by all the Buddhas.

original: bag chags dang bcas pa'i nyon mongs pa spangs pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i dri ma thams cad dang bral ba'i mtshan nyid ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes thob pa'o //
analyzed: bag chags dang bcas pa'i nyon mongs pa spangs pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i dri ma thams cad dang bral ba'i mtshan nyid ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes thob pa'o //
translated: The attainment of the gnosis of equality is the abandonment of the afflictions together with their traces, and the freedom from all the stains of the afflictions.

original: de'i rgyu mthun pa rin po che'i rigs de nyid ni mchog ste /
analyzed: de'i rgyu mthun pa rin po che'i rigs de nyid ni mchog ste /
translated: That very jewel family, which is the natural outflow of that, is the supreme.

original: 'khor ba ma stongs kyi bar du mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi nam mkha'i snying po'i rigs bskyed par mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: 'khor ba ma stongs kyi bar du mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi nam mkha'i snying po'i rigs bskyed par mdzad pa'o //
translated: until samsara is emptied, he generates the family of the essence of the space of the wisdom of equality.🔽Then,

original: de nas zhes bya ba ni de ma thag pa brjod pa ste /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba ni de ma thag pa brjod pa ste /
translated: the immediately following is stated.

original: gsol ba btab pa'i rjes thogs nyid la byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po ni byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i rang bzhin gyi sems dpa' ni sems dpa' chen po'o //
analyzed: gsol ba btab pa'i rjes thogs nyid la byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po ni byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i rang bzhin gyi sems dpa' ni sems dpa' chen po'o //
translated: Immediately after the request, the bodhisattva Akasagarbha, the great being of the nature of a bodhisattva,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bshad ma thag pa'i bka' 'di thos shing mnyan nas /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bshad ma thag pa'i bka' 'di thos shing mnyan nas /
translated: having heard and listened to this statement just explained by all the tathagatas,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba'i dam @95a * //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba'i dam @95a * //
translated: the pledge of empowerment of all tathagatas,

original: tshig ces bya ba la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: tshig ces bya ba la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'o //
translated: all tathagatas are Vairochana and so forth.

original: dbang bskur pa ni rin po che'i rigs su sbrul nas /
analyzed: dbang bskur pa ni rin po che'i rigs su sbrul nas /
translated: Empowerment is emanating as the jewel family,

original: de dag gi mgo bo la rin po che'i cod pan bskyed pa'o //
analyzed: de dag gi mgo bo la rin po che'i cod pan bskyed pa'o //
translated: and generating the jewel crown on their heads.

original: de'i dam tshig ni bskyed pa'i rgyu'o //
analyzed: de'i dam tshig ni bskyed pa'i rgyu'o //
translated: His pledge is the cause of its generation.

original: ming de skad ces bya ba'i snying po gang yin pa 'di gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: ming de skad ces bya ba'i snying po gang yin pa 'di gsungs pa'o //
translated: He spoke this essence, which is called by that name.

original: aom badzra ratna h'um zhes bya'o //
analyzed: aom badzra ratna h'um zhes bya'o //
translated: It is Oṃ vajraratna hūṃ.

original: 'di skad ston pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di skad ston pa yin te /
translated: This is what is being taught.

original: rin po che'i rigs bskyed par gsol ba 'debs pa'i tshig gsan nas /
analyzed: rin po che'i rigs bskyed par gsol ba 'debs pa'i tshig gsan nas /
translated: Having heard the words of the request to generate the jewel lineage,

original: bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la snying po 'dis rin po che cod pan gyis dbang bskur ba byin pa yin no //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la snying po 'dis rin po che cod pan gyis dbang bskur ba byin pa yin no //
translated: the Lord Ākāśagarbha gave the consecration of the jewel crown to all the tathāgatas with this essence.

original: de nas zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
translated: Then, as before,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi nor bu ni nor bu'i rigs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi nor bu ni nor bu'i rigs so //
translated: the jewel of all the tathāgatas is the jewel lineage.

original: de'i dam tshig ni de bskyed pa'i rgyu ste ming de skad ces bya ba rig pa dam pa gang yin pa 'di gsungs pa ni bshad pa'o //
analyzed: de'i dam tshig ni de bskyed pa'i rgyu ste ming de skad ces bya ba rig pa dam pa gang yin pa 'di gsungs pa ni bshad pa'o //
translated: His pledge is the cause of its generation. He spoke this sublime awareness, which is called by that name.

original: 'di skad ston pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di skad ston pa yin te /
translated: This is what is being taught.

original: 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying pos dbang bskur nas /
analyzed: 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying pos dbang bskur nas /
translated: Having consecrated Ākāśagarbha,

original: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad nor bu'i rigs kyi ngo bo'i rang bzhin la 'khor bskyed pa'i rgyur gyur pa'i rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs shing bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad nor bu'i rigs kyi ngo bo'i rang bzhin la 'khor bskyed pa'i rgyur gyur pa'i rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs shing bshad pa yin no //
translated: The Blessed One, Vairocana, the essence of the nature of the jewel lineage, spoke and explained this sublime knowledge that serves as the cause for generating the maṇḍala.

original: de ltar na phyag na rdo rje dang / rdo rje snying po dang / rdo rje spyan dang / rdo rje sna tshogs rnams kyis rdo rje snying po dang ; rin chen lta ba dang / rin chen padma dang / rin chen char 'bebs kyi dkyil 'khor bskyed pa'i rgyur gyur pa'i rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar na phyag na rdo rje dang / rdo rje snying po dang / rdo rje spyan dang / rdo rje sna tshogs rnams kyis rdo rje snying po dang ; rin chen lta ba dang / rin chen padma dang / rin chen char 'bebs kyi dkyil 'khor bskyed pa'i rgyur gyur pa'i rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs pa'o //
translated: Thus, Vajrapāṇi, Vajra Essence, Vajra Eye, and Vajra Variety spoke this sublime knowledge that serves as the cause for generating the maṇḍalas of Vajra Essence, Jewel View, Lotus Jewel, and Jewel Rain.

original: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni snga ma bzhin no //
translated: Then, the sound is as before.

original: de ltar bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad dang / rdo rje sems dpa' dang / rdo rje snying po dang / rdo rje lta ba dang / rdo rje sna tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor bskyed pa'i rgyur gyur pa'i rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs pa'i rjes thogs la byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po don thams cad grub pa'i gzugs can gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur🔽ba'i rin po che zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
analyzed: de ltar bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad dang / rdo rje sems dpa' dang / rdo rje snying po dang / rdo rje lta ba dang / rdo rje sna tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor bskyed pa'i rgyur gyur pa'i rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs pa'i rjes thogs la byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po don thams cad grub pa'i gzugs can gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba'i rin po che zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
translated: After the Bhagavān Vairocana, Vajrasattva, Vajragarbha, Vajranetra, and Vajrarupa had spoken this sublime knowledge that is the cause for generating the maṇḍala of Vajraviśva, the bodhisattva mahāsattva Ākāśagarbha, who has the form of Sarvārthasiddha, entered the samādhi called the precious empowerment of all tathāgatas.

original: de la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba'i rin po che ni rin po che'i rigs te /
analyzed: de la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba'i rin po che ni rin po che'i rigs te /
translated: In that regard, the precious empowerment of all tathāgatas is the precious family.

original: de la dmigs nas thugs rtse gcig tu mdzad de /
analyzed: de la dmigs nas thugs rtse gcig tu mdzad de /
translated: Having focused on that, he became one-pointed in mind.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par @95b zhugs nas /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par @95b zhugs nas /
translated: Having entered the samādhi called the empowerment of all tathāgatas,

original: don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i lha rnams sprul pa'i rnam par thugs rtse gcig tu mdzad ces bya ba'i don to /
analyzed: don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i lha rnams sprul pa'i rnam par thugs rtse gcig tu mdzad ces bya ba'i don to /
translated: The meaning is that he one-pointedly emanated the deities of the great maṇḍala of all accomplishments.

original: 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po snyoms par zhugs ma thag pa'i rjes thogs nyid la'o //
analyzed: 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po snyoms par zhugs ma thag pa'i rjes thogs nyid la'o //
translated: Immediately after noble Ākāśagarbha entered equipoise,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas ni rnam par snang mdzad dang / mi bskyod pa dang / rin chen 'byung ldan dang / 'od dpag tu med pa dang / don yod grub pa rnams kyi thugs ka las /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas ni rnam par snang mdzad dang / mi bskyod pa dang / rin chen 'byung ldan dang / 'od dpag tu med pa dang / don yod grub pa rnams kyi thugs ka las /
translated: from the hearts of all the tathāgatas—Vairocana, Akṣobhya, Ratnasaṃbhava, Amitābha, and Amoghasiddhi—

original: rdo rje nor bu rin chen lta bu'i 'od zer rnams byung nas zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: rdo rje nor bu rin chen lta bu'i 'od zer rnams byung nas zhes bya ba ni /
translated: vajra-jewel-like light rays arose.

original: ji skad du bshad pa'i rdo rje rin po che dang 'dra ba'o //
analyzed: ji skad du bshad pa'i rdo rje rin po che dang 'dra ba'o //
translated: They are like the explained vajra jewels.

original: de dag gi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang par byas te zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de dag gi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang par byas te zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Having illuminated all worlds,

original: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du rdo rje rin po che'i rnam pas rang rang gi gzugs su snang ba'o //
analyzed: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du rdo rje rin po che'i rnam pas rang rang gi gzugs su snang ba'o //
translated: In all the buddha-fields of the ten directions, he appears in the form of a vajra-jewel.

original: sems can thams cad ni rin po che'i rigs kyi rnal 'byor la mngon par dga' ba'i mtshan ma thob pa'o //
analyzed: sems can thams cad ni rin po che'i rigs kyi rnal 'byor la mngon par dga' ba'i mtshan ma thob pa'o //
translated: All sentient beings obtain the sign of delight in the yoga of the jewel family.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni rin po che'i rigs kyi dngos grub sgrub pa'i ye shes kyi mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni rin po che'i rigs kyi dngos grub sgrub pa'i ye shes kyi mtshan nyid do //
translated: The accomplishment of the jewel family is the characteristic of the gnosis of the accomplishment of the jewel family.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang gis dbang bskur nas /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang gis dbang bskur nas /
translated: Having been empowered by all the Tathagatas,

original: yang gcig tu gyur pa ni thugs kar zhugs pa'o //
analyzed: yang gcig tu gyur pa ni thugs kar zhugs pa'o //
translated: he becomes one, and enters into his heart.

original: gang gi thugs kar zhe na /
analyzed: gang gi thugs kar zhe na /
translated: Into whose heart?

original: bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po'i thugs su zhugs so //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po'i thugs su zhugs so //
translated: Into the heart of the Lord, the great bodhisattva Akasagarbha.

original: de nas zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin du shes par bya ste /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin du shes par bya ste /
translated: Then, as before, one should understand.

original: rdo rje rin po che 'od zer gyi rnam par zhugs pa nyid kyi rjes thogs la'o //
analyzed: rdo rje rin po che 'od zer gyi rnam par zhugs pa nyid kyi rjes thogs la'o //
translated: Immediately after the vajra-jewel enters in the form of light-rays,

original: de nas nam mkha'i snying po'i thugs las bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje nyid do zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de nas nam mkha'i snying po'i thugs las bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje nyid do zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Then, from the heart of Akashagarbha, Bhagavat Vajrapani himself.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka'i sems dpa'i rdo rje'i rnam pa las byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i sku byung bar gyur nas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka'i sems dpa'i rdo rje'i rnam pa las byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i sku byung bar gyur nas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: This is connected with the great bodhisattva body that arose from the form of the vajra being in the heart of all the tathagatas, and then remained in the lunar mandala, and then uttered this udana.

original: khyad par ji lta bu zhig ce na /
analyzed: khyad par ji lta bu zhig ce na /
translated: What is the distinction?

original: kun nas 'od zer 'bar ba'i snying po zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: kun nas 'od zer 'bar ba'i snying po zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: It is said, “the essence of the blazing light rays.”

original: kun nas 'od zer 'bar ba rin po che'i 'od des bskor zhing nang du zhugs par byas pas na kun nas 'od zer 'bar ba'i snying po'o //
analyzed: kun nas 'od zer 'bar ba rin po che'i 'od des bskor zhing nang du zhugs par byas pas na kun nas 'od zer 'bar ba'i snying po'o //
translated: The essence of the blazing light rays is the essence of the blazing light rays of the surrounding precious light rays, which are made by the surrounding precious light rays.

original: rdo rje dang / nor bu dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyis dbang bskur ba la sogs pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i sku zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: rdo rje dang / nor bu dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyis dbang bskur ba la sogs pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i sku zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The body is adorned with ornaments such as the vajra, jewel, and various precious consecrations.

original: rdo rje dang / nor bu dang / rin po che sna tshogs pa des dbang bskur ba ni /
analyzed: rdo rje dang / nor bu dang / rin po che sna tshogs pa des dbang bskur ba ni /
translated: The empowerment conferred by the vajra, the jewel, and the various precious substances is as follows.🔽

original: rdo rje dang / nor bu dang / rin po che sna tshogs pas dbang bskur ba'o //
analyzed: rdo rje dang / nor bu dang / rin po che sna tshogs pas dbang bskur ba'o //
translated: The consecration with that vajra, jewel, and various gems is the consecration with the vajra, jewel, and various gems.

original: @96a * // de dang por byas pa'i rgyan ni rdo rje dang nor bu dang rin po che sna tshogs pas dbang bskur ba la sogs pa'i rgyan no //
analyzed: @96a * // de dang por byas pa'i rgyan ni rdo rje dang nor bu dang rin po che sna tshogs pas dbang bskur ba la sogs pa'i rgyan no //
translated: The ornament that is made first is the ornament of the consecration with the vajra, jewel, and various gems, and so forth.

original: de'i rgyan gyis de rnam par brgyan pa'i sku ni rdo rje dang nor bu dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyis dbang bskur ba la sogs pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i sku'o //
analyzed: de'i rgyan gyis de rnam par brgyan pa'i sku ni rdo rje dang nor bu dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyis dbang bskur ba la sogs pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i sku'o //
translated: The body that is adorned with that ornament is the body adorned with the ornament of the consecration with the vajra, jewel, and various gems, and so forth.

original: de'i phyag na ci zhig bsnams she na /🔽rdo rje nor bu rin po che chen po'i mtshan ma phyag na bsnams pa'o zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de'i phyag na ci zhig bsnams she na / rdo rje nor bu rin po che chen po'i mtshan ma phyag na bsnams pa'o zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: What is held in his hands?🔽The vajra, jewel, and great gem insignia are held in his hands.

original: rdo rje nor bu yang yin la rin po che chen po yang de yin bas na /
analyzed: rdo rje nor bu yang yin la rin po che chen po yang de yin bas na /
translated: He is a vajra jewel and a great gem, and therefore

original: rdo rje nor bu'i rin po che chen po de nyid kyis mtshan ma'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa la sogs pa nas /
analyzed: rdo rje nor bu'i rin po che chen po de nyid kyis mtshan ma'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa la sogs pa nas /
translated: That very great jewel vajra gem is the sign of the mudra from the five-tined vajra and so on up to the jewel bell.

original: rin po che dril bu'i mthar thug pa'i phyag rgya ni rdo rje nor bu rin po che las phyag rgya'i mtshan ma'o //
analyzed: rin po che dril bu'i mthar thug pa'i phyag rgya ni rdo rje nor bu rin po che las phyag rgya'i mtshan ma'o //
translated: The mudra sign from the great jewel vajra gem is the mudra sign of the great jewel vajra gem.🔽Those who possess those hand implements become the great bodhisattva bodies holding the signs of the great jewel vajra gem in their hands.

original: de rnams kyi phyag mtshan dang ldan pa gang yin pa de ni rdo rje nor bu rin po che chen po'i mtshan ma phyag na bsnams pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i sku rnams su gyur te byung ba ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang las byung ba'o
analyzed: de rnams kyi phyag mtshan dang ldan pa gang yin pa de ni rdo rje nor bu rin po che chen po'i mtshan ma phyag na bsnams pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i sku rnams su gyur te byung ba ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang las byung ba'o
translated: They emerged from the Bhagavān Vajradhara.

original: // phyung nas des ci zhig byed ce na /
analyzed: // phyung nas des ci zhig byed ce na /
translated: Having emerged, what did they do?

original: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: It is said, “in all world systems.”

original: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sprin rgya mtsho rab 'byam thams cad du sems can rnam par gnas pa de la rin po che'i char phab pa la sogs pa nor bskyed pa rnams kyis bsgom pa la dga' ba'i skal ba dang ldan pa rnams mgu bar byas nas
analyzed: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sprin rgya mtsho rab 'byam thams cad du sems can rnam par gnas pa de la rin po che'i char phab pa la sogs pa nor bskyed pa rnams kyis bsgom pa la dga' ba'i skal ba dang ldan pa rnams mgu bar byas nas
translated: Having delighted those who are fortunate enough to enjoy the meditation by showering a rain of jewels on all the sentient beings who dwell in the infinite ocean-like cloud of world systems in the ten directions, and so on,🔽one should understand.

original: shes par bya'o// de mgu bar byas nas ci zhig byed ce na /
analyzed: shes par bya'o// de mgu bar byas nas ci zhig byed ce na /
translated: Having delighted them, what does one do?

original: slar yang byon te zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: slar yang byon te zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Again he came, and so on.

original: yang slar log nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyogs dang mtshams thams cad du rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul te /
analyzed: yang slar log nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyogs dang mtshams thams cad du rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul te /
translated: Again he returned, and in all the directions and corners of the Bhagavat Vairocana, in the manner of the great mandala of the vajra realm,

original: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i cha byad kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do //
analyzed: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i cha byad kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do //
translated: dwelling on a moon disc in the attire explained in the great mandala of the vajra realm, he spoke this utterance:

original: ae ma ho zhes bya ba ni ngo mtshar ba'o //
analyzed: ae ma ho zhes bya ba ni ngo mtshar ba'o //
translated: Amazing!

original: ni zhes bya ba ni gang gi phyir gyi don te /
analyzed: ni zhes bya ba ni gang gi phyir gyi don te /
translated: means why?

original: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //🔽rin chen thams cad bsdus pa ni //
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi // rin chen thams cad bsdus pa ni //
translated: Of all the Buddhas.🔽The gathering of all jewels

original: zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas thams cad dang 'brel pa'i rin po che thams cad bsdus pas na rin chen thams cad bsdus pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas thams cad dang 'brel pa'i rin po che thams cad bsdus pas na rin chen thams cad bsdus pa'o //
translated: is the gathering of all jewels connected with all the Buddhas.

original: de gang zhig gis she na /
analyzed: de gang zhig gis she na /
translated: By what is it done?

original: rdo rje rin chen rigs nyid du //🔽zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: rdo rje rin chen rigs nyid du // zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: By the jewel-vajra lineage itself.

original: rdo rje rin chen 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'i rigs ston pa yin te /
analyzed: rdo rje rin chen 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'i rigs ston pa yin te /

analyzed: 'di skad ston pa yin te /

analyzed: rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi phyag rgya bcings la /

analyzed: yi ge aa las rdo rje thal mo'i mthe bo gnyis brkyang la /

analyzed: rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi phyag rgya'o //

analyzed: de nas aom bhur dz'a la h'um sv'a h'a /

analyzed: zhes brjod cing /

analyzed: cha gsum pa dang bcas pa dang yan lag thams cad khrus byas la /

analyzed: aom bhur dz'a la h'um sv'a h'a /

analyzed: de nyid kyis bdas rang byin gyis brlabs te /

analyzed: langs la aom shi kha re ru ta phat /

analyzed: ces bzlas pa'i chus gos la sogs pa bsangs te /

analyzed: badzra satva zhes brjod cing ji lta ba bzhin du bgos la /

analyzed: yang rdo rje rtse mo bzlas pa'i dri'i chu dang nor bu'i gnod sbyin bzlas pas stan dang lha'i khang pa bsangs te /

original: sa ma ya stram /
analyzed: sa ma ya stram /

original: zhes brjod la 'dug par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes brjod la 'dug par bya'o //

analyzed: lce'i padma'i 'dab mar h'um las rdo rje rtse lnga pa dkar po bskyed la /

analyzed: gzhom pa la sogs pa bya'o //

analyzed: yi ge h'um gis ti r'anti ri bcings te /

analyzed: dbral ba'i phyogs su gzhag par bya'o //

analyzed: snga ma bzhin du go cha bcings te /

analyzed: mthar mnyam pa'i thal mos mnyes par byas nas /

analyzed: de nas h'um badzra aa na la /

analyzed: yang rdo rje bsdams pa bcings la mthe bo gnyis brkyang ste snyoms te bzhag la /

translated: With the two vajra fists, interlace the two little fingers like a chain, join the tips of the two index fingers, reverse them, and place them on the crown of the head: this is the seal of Vajroshnisha.

analyzed: yang rdo rje zhags pa de nyid bcing bar byas te /

original: aom badzra p'a sha hri /
analyzed: aom badzra p'a sha hri /

analyzed: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis mkhrig ma mdud pa byas pa 'di ni zhags pa'i phyag rgya'o //

analyzed: rdo rje ba dan gyis nub phyogs bcing bar bya ste /

original: aom badzra pa tam ke pa tam gi ni ra ta /
analyzed: aom badzra pa tam ke pa tam gi ni ra ta /

analyzed: byang phyogs su rdo rje nag mos bcing bar bya ste /

original: hri badzra ka li ru ta ma ta /
analyzed: hri badzra ka li ru ta ma ta /

analyzed: sngar bshad pa'i rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi phyag rgya snying gar bstan par byas pa ni rdo rje nag mo'i phyag rgya'o //
translated: The vajra yakṣa mudra explained previously is displayed at the heart: this is the vajra black one mudra.

original: rdo rje rtse mos lto bcing bar bya ste /
analyzed: rdo rje rtse mos lto bcing bar bya ste /
translated: One should bind the navel with the vajra peak.

original: sngar bshad pa nyid kyi sngags dang / rdo rje khu tshur gnyis ri bo 'degs pa'i tshul du bya ba ni rdo rje rtse mo'i phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: sngar bshad pa nyid kyi sngags dang / rdo rje khu tshur gnyis ri bo 'degs pa'i tshul du bya ba ni rdo rje rtse mo'i phyag rgya'o //
translated: The mantra is as previously explained, and the two vajra fists in the manner of lifting a mountain is the mudra of Vajra Peak.

original: rdo rje las kyi dkyil 'khor bcing bar byas la ra bar brtsig par bya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje las kyi dkyil 'khor bcing bar byas la ra bar brtsig par bya'o //

original: h'um badzra karmma yang rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi nang du rab byas te /
analyzed: h'um badzra karmma yang rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi nang du rab byas te /

analyzed: h'um zhes brjod cing / rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la //
translated: one should recite hūṃ.🔽Having bound the two vajra fists,

analyzed: lag ngar rdo rje byas nas su // mthe'u chung lcags kyur bcing bar bya //

analyzed: mdzub mo gnyis kyis bsdigs pa ni //

analyzed: 'jig rten gsum rgyal zhes bya'o //

original: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi phyag rgya'o //

analyzed: de nyid las gung mo gnyis brkyang ba ni rdo rje las kyi phyag rgya'o //

analyzed: rdo rje bsdams pa dang / badzra bandha bam zhes bya ba ni rdo rje bla re bya'o //
