original: de nas nor bu'i gnod sbyin yongs su bzlas pa'i dri'i chu'i snod lha'i khang pa'i sgor gzhag pa la bsang gtor byas la /
analyzed: de nas nor bu'i gnod sbyin yongs su bzlas pa'i dri'i chu'i snod lha'i khang pa'i sgor gzhag pa la bsang gtor byas la /
translated: Then, having placed the vessel of scented water, which is completely filled with the scent of the yakṣa gem, at the door of the celestial mansion, one should perform the sprinkling.

original: nor bu'i gnod sbyin bzlas pa'i dri'i chu nyid kyis mchod pa'i yan lag thams cad bsad pa dang / sngar bshad pa'i rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa'i sngags kyis lan gsum mngon par bzlas la /
analyzed: nor bu'i gnod sbyin bzlas pa'i dri'i chu nyid kyis mchod pa'i yan lag thams cad bsad pa dang / sngar bshad pa'i rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa'i sngags kyis lan gsum mngon par bzlas la /
translated: Then, having sprinkled all the limbs of worship with the scented water of the yakṣa gem, and having recited the mantra with the previously explained vajra-lady gesture, one should recite it three times.🔽Then, with the flower gesture, one should recite three times “vajra puṣpe hūṃ.”🔽With the scent gesture, one should recite “oṃ vajra gandhe.”

original: me tog gi phyag rgya dang badzra pushpe h'um zhes lan gsum mngon par bzla bar bya ba dang / aom badzra gandhe zhes dri'i phyag rgyas dri'o //
analyzed: me tog gi phyag rgya dang badzra pushpe h'um zhes lan gsum mngon par bzla bar bya ba dang / aom badzra gandhe zhes dri'i phyag rgyas dri'o //
translated: With the incense gesture, one should recite “oṃ vajra dhūpe.”🔽With the lamp gesture, one should recite “oṃ vajra āloke.”

original: aom badzra dh'u pe h'um zhes bya ba dang / aa k'a ro mu kham sarbba dharmm'a n'am /
analyzed: aom badzra dh'u pe h'um zhes bya ba dang / aa k'a ro mu kham sarbba dharmm'a n'am /
translated: With the perfume gesture, one should recite “oṃ vajra vīṇe.”

original: a'adya nutpanna tv'a ta ces bya ba dang / @101a * //🔽lha bshos la yongs su bzla'o //
analyzed: a'adya nutpanna tv'a ta ces bya ba dang / @101a * // lha bshos la yongs su bzla'o //
translated: With the food gesture, one should recite “oṃ vajra naividye.”

original: de'i phyag rgya ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: de'i phyag rgya ni 'di yin te /
translated: With the music gesture, one should recite “oṃ vajra śabda.”🔽With the gesture of the five offerings, one should recite “oṃ vajra pañca-pūja-megha-samudra-spharaṇa samaye hūṃ.”🔽With the gesture of the five offerings, one should recite “oṃ vajra pañca-pūja-megha-samudra-spharaṇa samaye hūṃ.”🔽With the gesture of the five offerings, one should recite “oṃ vajra pañca-pūja-megha-samudra-spharaṇa samaye hūṃ.”

original: rdo rje bsdams pa las ral gri 'dren pa'i tshul du byed pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje bsdams pa las ral gri 'dren pa'i tshul du byed pa'o //
translated: One should make the gesture of drawing a sword from the vajra fist.

original: aom badzra a'a lo ke zhes bya ba dang / mar me'i phyag rgyas mar me la'o //
analyzed: aom badzra a'a lo ke zhes bya ba dang / mar me'i phyag rgyas mar me la'o //
translated: With Oṃ vajra āloke, and the lamp gesture, [one offers] a lamp.

original: aom sarbba aartha si ddhi pra ta h'um /
analyzed: aom sarbba aartha si ddhi pra ta h'um /
translated: With Oṃ sarva-artha-siddhi-pratha-haṃ,

original: dri chen ser po'i chu la me tog ser po dang / zho dang til nag po dang / ku sha dang 'bras bu la sogs pa dung chos la sogs pa'i snod du bcug la /
analyzed: dri chen ser po'i chu la me tog ser po dang / zho dang til nag po dang / ku sha dang 'bras bu la sogs pa dung chos la sogs pa'i snod du bcug la /
translated: one should place the urine of yellow mustard seeds, yellow flowers, yogurt, black sesame seeds, kuśa grass, fruits, and so on, in a conch shell or other vessel.

original: rdo rje thal mo kha phye ba'i mtshan nyid can de'i phyag rgya lan gsum bzlas la gzhag par bya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje thal mo kha phye ba'i mtshan nyid can de'i phyag rgya lan gsum bzlas la gzhag par bya'o //
translated: With the characteristic of opening the vajra palms, one should place it with that seal, repeating it three times.

original: de nas nor bu'i rgyu'i las kyi phyag rgyas don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po sprul la ;
analyzed: de nas nor bu'i rgyu'i las kyi phyag rgyas don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po sprul la ;
translated: Then, with the causal seal of the jewel, one should emanate the great maṇḍala of all accomplishments.

original: yod cing 'byor na mchod pa rnam pa lngas yang dag par mchod la /
analyzed: yod cing 'byor na mchod pa rnam pa lngas yang dag par mchod la /
translated: If one has the means, one should make perfect offerings with the five offerings.

original: phyag bya ba sngon du 'gro ba dang / sdom pa gzung ba byas nas mnyam pa'i thal mo dang / yang rdo rje thal mo dang rdo rje bsdams pa bcings la /
analyzed: phyag bya ba sngon du 'gro ba dang / sdom pa gzung ba byas nas mnyam pa'i thal mo dang / yang rdo rje thal mo dang rdo rje bsdams pa bcings la /
translated: and also form the vajra-aṅkuśa and vajra-bond.

original: de nas rdo rje bsdams pa snying gar dral bar bya'o //🔽de nas rdo rje 'bebs pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la /
analyzed: de nas rdo rje bsdams pa snying gar dral bar bya'o // de nas rdo rje 'bebs pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la /
translated: Then one should break the vajra-bond at the heart.🔽Then one should form the pledge seal of the vajra-descent,

original: badzra a'a be sha zhes brjod cing /
analyzed: badzra a'a be sha zhes brjod cing /
translated: recite vajra-āveśaya,

original: aa zhes bya bas bdag nyid la dbab par bya'o //
analyzed: aa zhes bya bas bdag nyid la dbab par bya'o //
translated: and with the syllable a one should cause oneself to descend.

original: tishtha badzra dri dho me zhes bya ba la sogs pa dbab pa nye bar bsdu bar byas la /
analyzed: tishtha badzra dri dho me zhes bya ba la sogs pa dbab pa nye bar bsdu bar byas la /
translated: With tiṣṭha vajra-dṛḍho me one should perform the descent of the awareness being.

original: badzra mushti zhes brjod cing /
analyzed: badzra mushti zhes brjod cing /
translated: Reciting vajra-muṣṭi,

original: rdo rje dbyings las bshad pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings te /
analyzed: rdo rje dbyings las bshad pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings te /
translated: one should form the pledge seal explained in the Vajra Realm,

original: aom badzra sandhi bam zhes lan gsum brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: aom badzra sandhi bam zhes lan gsum brjod par bya'o //
translated: and recite oṃ vajra-saṃdhi-vaṃ three times.

original: sdig pa dral ba'i phyag rgyas sdig pa dral te /
analyzed: sdig pa dral ba'i phyag rgyas sdig pa dral te /
translated: With the seal for breaking evil one should break evil.

original: de nas rnam par snang mdzad kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la /
analyzed: de nas rnam par snang mdzad kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la /
translated: Then, form the pledge seal of Vairochana.

original: aom buddha ratna h'um zhes lan gsum brjod cing /
analyzed: aom buddha ratna h'um zhes lan gsum brjod cing /
translated: Recite three times, “Oṃ buddha ratna hūṃ.”🔽With “vajrā muḥ,” place it on the moon at one’s heart.

original: badzra mu: zhes bya bas rang gi snying ga'i zla ba la bcug pas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad der zhu bar bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: badzra mu: zhes bya bas rang gi snying ga'i zla ba la bcug pas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad der zhu bar bsam par bya'o //
translated: Think that the Bhagavat Vairochana melts there.

original: de ltar nor bu 'bebs pa'i bar gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la /🔽aom ma ni ratna a'a be sha aa /
analyzed: de ltar nor bu 'bebs pa'i bar gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la / aom ma ni ratna a'a be sha aa /
translated: In that way, form the pledge seal of up to Ratnasaṃbhava.

original: zhes lan gsum zlos shing /
analyzed: zhes lan gsum zlos shing /
translated: Recite three times, “Oṃ maṇi ratnāveśa aḥ.”

original: aom badzra mu: zhes yongs su bzlas pas rang gi snying ga'i zla ba der phyag rgyas bcug pas /
analyzed: aom badzra mu: zhes yongs su bzlas pas rang gi snying ga'i zla ba der phyag rgyas bcug pas /
translated: With “oṃ vajra muḥ,” recite the complete mantra.

original: bcom ldan 'das rin chen 'bebs pa rang gi snying gar zhu par bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rin chen 'bebs pa rang gi snying gar zhu par bsam par bya'o //
translated: Think that the seal is placed on the moon at one’s heart, and the Bhagavat Ratnasaṃbhava melts into one’s heart.

original: de ltar lha thams cad kyi rang bzhin gyis byang chub sems kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bskyed nas /
analyzed: de ltar lha thams cad kyi rang bzhin gyis byang chub sems kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bskyed nas /
translated: In that way, having generated the moon maṇḍala of bodhicitta, which is the nature of all deities,

original: skyil mo krung bcas la ting nge 'dzin mchog gi phyag rgya bcings te /
analyzed: skyil mo krung bcas la ting nge 'dzin mchog gi phyag rgya bcings te /
translated: Having sat down cross-legged, one should form the gesture of supreme meditative concentration.

original: rang gi snying ga'i zla ba la rdo rje rin po che bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: rang gi snying ga'i zla ba la rdo rje rin po che bsam par bya'o //
translated: In one's heart, on a moon[-disc], one should imagine a vajra-jewel.

original: rdo rje rin po che'i dbus su//
analyzed: rdo rje rin po che'i dbus su//
translated: In the middle of the vajra-jewel,

original: @101b aom sarbba aartha siddhi pra ta h'um zhes bya ba yid kyis bris la /
analyzed: @101b aom sarbba aartha siddhi pra ta h'um zhes bya ba yid kyis bris la /
translated: one should mentally write the syllable A, and then the syllable Om, and then the syllable Sarva-arthasiddhi-prada Hum.

original: 'di nyid yid kyis brjod de /
analyzed: 'di nyid yid kyis brjod de /
translated: Mentally reciting this,

original: chos thams cad bdag med par bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: chos thams cad bdag med par bsgom par bya'o //
translated: one should meditate on the selflessness of all phenomena.

original: de nas snying po de nyid dang / aa a'a /
analyzed: de nas snying po de nyid dang / aa a'a /
translated: Then, with that very essence, and with the sixteen vowels,🔽A A,

original: ai a'i / au a'u /
analyzed: ai a'i / au a'u /
translated: I I, U U,

original: ri r'i / li l'i /
analyzed: ri r'i / li l'i /
translated: R Ri, L Li,🔽E Ai, O Au,

original: ae aee / ao aoo /🔽aam aa: zhes bya ba dbyangs yig bcu drug dang bcas pas rang gi sems zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: ae aee / ao aoo / aam aa: zhes bya ba dbyangs yig bcu drug dang bcas pas rang gi sems zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par bsam par bya'o //
translated: AM AH,🔽one should imagine one's mind in the form of a moon-disc.

original: dbyangs yig bcu drug po 'di nyid ni nor bu'i mtshan ma la sogs pa nas /
analyzed: dbyangs yig bcu drug po 'di nyid ni nor bu'i mtshan ma la sogs pa nas /
translated: One should understand that these very sixteen vowels, from the sign of the jewel up to the jewel fist,

original: nor bu'i khu tshur gyi mthar thug pa yin par 'dir shes bar bya'o //
analyzed: nor bu'i khu tshur gyi mthar thug pa yin par 'dir shes bar bya'o //
translated: are here.

original: de nas de'i steng du snying po de nyid dang / yi ge ka la sogs pa dang bcas pa la zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gnyis par bsam mo //
analyzed: de nas de'i steng du snying po de nyid dang / yi ge ka la sogs pa dang bcas pa la zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gnyis par bsam mo //
translated: Then, on top of that, one should imagine a second moon disk together with that essence mantra and the ka syllable and so forth.

original: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gnyis pa de nyid dang / aom sarbba aartha siddhi pra ta h'um zhes bya ba'i snying po dang bcas pas rdo rje rtse lnga par bsam mo //
analyzed: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gnyis pa de nyid dang / aom sarbba aartha siddhi pra ta h'um zhes bya ba'i snying po dang bcas pas rdo rje rtse lnga par bsam mo //
translated: That very second moon disk together with the essence mantra Om sarva artha siddhi pra ta hum should be imagined as a five-pronged vajra.

original: rdo rje de nyid rdo rje rin po cher byas la de'i dbus su /
analyzed: rdo rje de nyid rdo rje rin po cher byas la de'i dbus su /
translated: That very vajra should be made into a vajra jewel, and in its center

original: aom sarbba aartha siddhi pra ta h'um zhes yid kyis bri sa la /
analyzed: aom sarbba aartha siddhi pra ta h'um zhes yid kyis bri sa la /
translated: one should mentally write Om sarva artha siddhi pra ta hum.

original: badzra ratna ham zhes bya bas rdo rje rin po che'i nga rgyal bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: badzra ratna ham zhes bya bas rdo rje rin po che'i nga rgyal bsgom par bya'o //
translated: With the words Vajra ratna ham, one should cultivate the pride of being a vajra jewel.

original: de ltar bsams la rdo rje rin chen gyi bdag nyid gang yin pa bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba dang / mchod pa dang / dam tshig gi dngos grub kyi tshul gyis 'bras bu bsgrub pa yin no zhes nges pa bskyed la sems bskyed pa'i sbyor bas /
analyzed: de ltar bsams la rdo rje rin chen gyi bdag nyid gang yin pa bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba dang / mchod pa dang / dam tshig gi dngos grub kyi tshul gyis 'bras bu bsgrub pa yin no zhes nges pa bskyed la sems bskyed pa'i sbyor bas /
translated: Having contemplated in that way, one should generate the ascertainment that the one who is the nature of the Vajra Gem, the Bhagavān Ākāśagarbha, is empowered by all the Tathāgatas, and that he is the one who accomplishes the result by way of the worship and the pledge-success.

original: rdo rje rin chen de rdo rje sems dpar bdag nyid bsgoms la /
analyzed: rdo rje rin chen de rdo rje sems dpar bdag nyid bsgoms la /
translated: Then, with the application of generating the mind, one should meditate on oneself as Vajra-Sattva, the Vajra Gem.

original: badzra satva ham zhes zlos shing snyoms pa dang bcas pas rdo rje gsor zhing /
analyzed: badzra satva ham zhes zlos shing snyoms pa dang bcas pas rdo rje gsor zhing /
translated: Reciting “vajra-sattva-haṃ,” one should wave the vajra with the equipoise.

original: 'di skad brjad par bya'o //
analyzed: 'di skad brjad par bya'o //
translated: One should say this:

original: aom badzra satva ham rdo rje sems dpa' de nyid /
analyzed: aom badzra satva ham rdo rje sems dpa' de nyid /
translated: “Oṃ vajra-sattva-haṃ” is the very Vajra-Sattva.

original: aom sarbba aartha siddhi pra ta h'um zhes bzlas pas nam mkha'i snying po'i bdag nyid du bsams la ma h'a sa ma ya sa tva ham zhes brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: aom sarbba aartha siddhi pra ta h'um zhes bzlas pas nam mkha'i snying po'i bdag nyid du bsams la ma h'a sa ma ya sa tva ham zhes brjod par bya'o //
translated: Reciting “oṃ sarva-artha-siddhi-prati-haṃ,” one should think of oneself as the nature of Ākāśagarbha and say “mahā-saṃ-a-haṃ.”

original: de nas don thams cad grub pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la sa ma ya ham zhes brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas don thams cad grub pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la sa ma ya ham zhes brjod par bya'o //
translated: Then, form the pledge seal of All-Accomplishing Action and say Samaya ham.

original: don thams cad grub pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya de nyid kyis snying ga dang / dpral ba dang / lkog ma dang spyi bor byin gyis brlab bar bya'o //
analyzed: don thams cad grub pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya de nyid kyis snying ga dang / dpral ba dang / lkog ma dang spyi bor byin gyis brlab bar bya'o //
translated: Bless the heart, forehead, throat, and head with that very pledge seal of All-Accomplishing Action.

original: sa ma ya satva aa dhi tishtha sva mam /
analyzed: sa ma ya satva aa dhi tishtha sva mam /
translated: Samayasattva adhisthana svam

original: de nas rin po ches mtshan pa'i dril bu lag pa g-yon pa'i rin po che khu tshur gyis blangs la lag pa g-yas pa'i rdo rje nor bu dang / bcom ldan 'das don thams cad grub pa'i phyag rgya chen po bcing bar bya'o //
analyzed: de nas rin po ches mtshan pa'i dril bu lag pa g-yon pa'i rin po che khu tshur gyis blangs la lag pa g-yas pa'i rdo rje nor bu dang / bcom ldan 'das don thams cad grub pa'i phyag rgya chen po bcing bar bya'o //
translated: Then, take up the bell marked with a jewel with the jewel fist of the left hand, and with the vajra-jewel of the right hand form the great seal of the Blessed One All-Accomplishing Action.

original: de nas nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i @102a * //
analyzed: de nas nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i @102a * //
translated: Then, with the yoga of space,

original: sbyor bas snying gar zhugs la nor bu rgyu'i las kyi phyag rgyas don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po sbrul par bya'o //
analyzed: sbyor bas snying gar zhugs la nor bu rgyu'i las kyi phyag rgyas don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po sbrul par bya'o //
translated: enter into the heart, and with the causal action seal of the jewel, emanate the great maṇḍala of All-Accomplishing Action.

original: rdo rje nor bu chen po'i dam tshig gi phyag rgyas me tog gi phreng ba blangs te /
analyzed: rdo rje nor bu chen po'i dam tshig gi phyag rgyas me tog gi phreng ba blangs te /
translated: Taking the flower garland with the great vajra gem pledge seal,

original: bdag nyid der ji lta ba bzhin du zhugs la me tog dor ba'i sngags kyis rang gi spyi bor me tog dor bar bya'o //
analyzed: bdag nyid der ji lta ba bzhin du zhugs la me tog dor ba'i sngags kyis rang gi spyi bor me tog dor bar bya'o //
translated: one should enter there just as before and cast the flower with the mantra of casting the flower.

original: de nas phreng ba'i dbang bskur ba'i sngags kyis phreng ba de spyi bor bcing bar bya'o //
analyzed: de nas phreng ba'i dbang bskur ba'i sngags kyis phreng ba de spyi bor bcing bar bya'o //
translated: Then, with the mantra of conferring the garland empowerment, one should tie the garland on one’s head.

original: dngos grub kyi rin po che brtul zhugs kyi mthar thug pa'i cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad la //
analyzed: dngos grub kyi rin po che brtul zhugs kyi mthar thug pa'i cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad la //
translated: One should perform all the rites of the ultimate discipline of the jewel of spiritual powers.

original: de nas dkyil 'khor de nam mkha'i dang mtshungs par bsam mo //
analyzed: de nas dkyil 'khor de nam mkha'i dang mtshungs par bsam mo //
translated: Then one should imagine that maṇḍala to be like space.

original: yang bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying po'i phyag rgya chen po bcings la /
analyzed: yang bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying po'i phyag rgya chen po bcings la /
translated: Again, one should form the great seal of the transcendent Bhagavān Ākāśagarbha,

original: rang gi lus la lha thams cad kyi gnas su sa ma ya aa zhes brjod pas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bskyed par bya'o //
analyzed: rang gi lus la lha thams cad kyi gnas su sa ma ya aa zhes brjod pas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bskyed par bya'o //
translated: and with the utterance of samaya one should generate a moon maṇḍala in the location of all the deities in one’s body.

original: gzhi'i lus kyi rang gi gnas su gnas te /
analyzed: gzhi'i lus kyi rang gi gnas su gnas te /
translated: The deities abide in their own locations in the body of the basis.

original: gzhi'i lus la phyi rol gyi mdun du yang sa ma ya aa zhes bya bas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor sbrul pa de'i steng du aom sarbba aartha siddhi pra ta h'um aa zhes rdo rje rin po che phab la /
analyzed: gzhi'i lus la phyi rol gyi mdun du yang sa ma ya aa zhes bya bas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor sbrul pa de'i steng du aom sarbba aartha siddhi pra ta h'um aa zhes rdo rje rin po che phab la /
translated: In the body of the basis, in front of oneself externally, one should emanate a moon maṇḍala with the syllable samayasattva, and on top of that, with the syllable oṃ sarva arthasiddhi pratha haṃ a, one should cause the vajra jewel to descend.

original: de'i dbus su aom sarbba aartha siddhi pra ta h'um zhes bya ba yid kyis bris la /🔽badzra ratna ham zhes bya bas rdo rje rin po che'i nga rgyal bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i dbus su aom sarbba aartha siddhi pra ta h'um zhes bya ba yid kyis bris la / badzra ratna ham zhes bya bas rdo rje rin po che'i nga rgyal bsgom par bya'o //
translated: In the center of that, with the syllable oṃ sarva arthasiddhi pratha haṃ, one should mentally write the syllable.🔽With the syllable vajra ratna haṃ, one should meditate on the pride of the vajra jewel.

original: rdo rje rin po che de nyid badzra garbha ham zhes bya bas rdo rje snying por bdag nyid bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje rin po che de nyid badzra garbha ham zhes bya bas rdo rje snying por bdag nyid bsgom par bya'o //
translated: With the syllable vajra garbha haṃ, one should meditate on oneself as the vajra essence.

original: de la de nyid du rin po che lcags kyu dang / zhags pa dang / lcags sgrog dang / 'bebs pa'i las kyi phyag rgya rnams kyis dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du byas te /
analyzed: de la de nyid du rin po che lcags kyu dang / zhags pa dang / lcags sgrog dang / 'bebs pa'i las kyi phyag rgya rnams kyis dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du byas te /
translated: There, with the hook, the lasso, the shackles, and the bell of the action seal of the jewel, one should summon, induct, bind, and control.

original: aom sarbba aartha siddhi pra ta dri shya h'um /
analyzed: aom sarbba aartha siddhi pra ta dri shya h'um /
translated: oṃ sarva arthasiddhi pratha dṛśya haṃ

original: bcom ldan 'das rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bltas la /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bltas la /
translated: The Blessed One should look at the Blessed One with his own pledge seal.

original: dza: h'um bam ho: sa gzhug pa dang / rang gi lus las lus kyi gnas su gnas pa de nyid la bcug la sa ma ya stvam zhes brjod pas 'od kyi dkyil 'khor phab ste /
analyzed: dza: h'um bam ho: sa gzhug pa dang / rang gi lus las lus kyi gnas su gnas pa de nyid la bcug la sa ma ya stvam zhes brjod pas 'od kyi dkyil 'khor phab ste /
translated: With Jâḥ hûṁ vaṁ hoḥ, he should enter his own body, and with Samaya stvam, he should cause the mandala of light to descend.

original: sa ma ya stvam aa ham /
analyzed: sa ma ya stvam aa ham /
translated: Samaya stvam aham.

original: aom sarbba aartha siddhi pra ta h'um zhes zlos shing /
analyzed: aom sarbba aartha siddhi pra ta h'um zhes zlos shing /
translated: Om, accomplish all aims, I pray, hûṁ.

original: bcom ldan 'das la zhugs la bdag nyid dang lhan cig tha mi dad par bsgom par bya'o //🔽de bzhin du rin chen 'bebs pa'i phyag rgya bcings te /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das la zhugs la bdag nyid dang lhan cig tha mi dad par bsgom par bya'o // de bzhin du rin chen 'bebs pa'i phyag rgya bcings te /
translated: Reciting this, he should enter the Blessed One and meditate on himself as non-differentiated from him.

original: rang gi lus kyi gnas su yid kyis 'dug ste /
analyzed: rang gi lus kyi gnas su yid kyis 'dug ste /
translated: In the same way, he should form the Ratnasaṃbhava seal and mentally place it in his own body.

original: rang gi lus las phyi rol gyi mdun du sa ma ya aa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor sbrul la /🔽@102b de'i steng du /
analyzed: rang gi lus las phyi rol gyi mdun du sa ma ya aa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor sbrul la / @102b de'i steng du /
translated: With Samaya aḥ, he should emanate the mandala in front of his own body outside.

original: aom ma ni ratna a'a be sha aa: zhes bya bas rin po che'i dril bu bskyed de /
analyzed: aom ma ni ratna a'a be sha aa: zhes bya bas rin po che'i dril bu bskyed de /
translated: Above that, with Om maṇi ratnâveśa aḥ, he should generate a jewel-handled bell.

original: de'i dbus su aom ma ni ratna a'a be sha zhes yid kyis bris la badzra ma ni ratna gha nde aa ham zhes bya bas rdo rje nor bu rin po che'i dril bu'i nga rgyal bskyed par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i dbus su aom ma ni ratna a'a be sha zhes yid kyis bris la badzra ma ni ratna gha nde aa ham zhes bya bas rdo rje nor bu rin po che'i dril bu'i nga rgyal bskyed par bya'o //
translated: In the center of that, mentally write oṃ maṇi ratnāveśa, and with vajra maṇi ratna ghaṇḍe aham, generate pride in the bell of the jewel-possessing vajra.

original: aom ma ni ratna a'a be sha aa: zhes zlos shing ma ni ratna a'a be sha h'um zhes bya bas de rin chen 'bebs pas bar bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: aom ma ni ratna a'a be sha aa: zhes zlos shing ma ni ratna a'a be sha h'um zhes bya bas de rin chen 'bebs pas bar bsgom par bya'o //
translated: Reciting oṃ maṇi ratnāveśa aḥ, and meditating on maṇi ratnāveśa hūṃ,🔽one should summon, induct, bind, and control the jewel-possessing vajra.

original: de la de nyid du nor bu rin po che 'bebs pa dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du byas la rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang / aom ma ni ratna a'a be sha aa dri shya zhes bya bas bltas la /
analyzed: de la de nyid du nor bu rin po che 'bebs pa dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du byas la rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang / aom ma ni ratna a'a be sha aa dri shya zhes bya bas bltas la /
translated: With one’s pledge seal and oṃ maṇi ratnāveśa adṛśya, look at it.

original: dam tshig gi phyag rgyas de nyid du dza: h'um bam ho: sa rang gi lus la bzhugs par bya'o //
analyzed: dam tshig gi phyag rgyas de nyid du dza: h'um bam ho: sa rang gi lus la bzhugs par bya'o //
translated: With the pledge seal, at that very place, with jaḥ hūṃ vaṃ hoḥ, one should cause it to enter one’s body.

original: zhugs pa dang sa ma ya stvam zhes brjod pas /
analyzed: zhugs pa dang sa ma ya stvam zhes brjod pas /
translated: With the entry, say samaya stvaṃ.

original: 'od kyi dkyil 'khor la sa ma ya stvam aa ham aom ma ni ratna a'a be sha aa: zhes lan gsum brjod pas /
analyzed: 'od kyi dkyil 'khor la sa ma ya stvam aa ham aom ma ni ratna a'a be sha aa: zhes lan gsum brjod pas /
translated: Recite samaya stvaṃ aham oṃ maṇi ratnāvaśa aḥ three times.

original: bcom ldan 'das nor bu rin po che 'bebs pa dang bdag nyid lhan cig tha mi dad par bsam par bya'o //🔽de nas gzhi'i lus dang / don thams cad grub pa la sogs pa nas /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das nor bu rin po che 'bebs pa dang bdag nyid lhan cig tha mi dad par bsam par bya'o // de nas gzhi'i lus dang / don thams cad grub pa la sogs pa nas /
translated: Think that the Bhagavat Avalokiteśvara and oneself are not different.

original: nor bu rin chen 'bebs pa la sogs pa'i mthar thug pa'i sku la rnam par snang mdzad dang / mi bskyod pa dang / rin chen 'byung ldan dang / snang ba mtha' yas dang / don yod grub pa rnams 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yid kyis legs so zhes bya ba'i sbyor bas bcug la /
analyzed: nor bu rin chen 'bebs pa la sogs pa'i mthar thug pa'i sku la rnam par snang mdzad dang / mi bskyod pa dang / rin chen 'byung ldan dang / snang ba mtha' yas dang / don yod grub pa rnams 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yid kyis legs so zhes bya ba'i sbyor bas bcug la /
translated: Then, in the body of the basis, and in the body of Amoghasiddhi, and so on, up to the body of Avalokiteśvara, imagine that Vairocana, Akṣobhya, Ratnasambhava, Amitābha, and Amoghasiddhi, equal to the particles of all world realms, are mentally invited with the utterance of “excellent” by all tathāgatas.

original: dza: h'um bam ho: zhes yid kyis brjod cing /
analyzed: dza: h'um bam ho: zhes yid kyis brjod cing /
translated: Mentally recite “jaḥ hūṃ vaṃ hoḥ.”

original: de nas rdo rje dbyings las sngar bshad pa'i tshul gyis rang rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgyas de sgrub po //
analyzed: de nas rdo rje dbyings las sngar bshad pa'i tshul gyis rang rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgyas de sgrub po //
translated: Then, with one’s own pledge seal as explained previously in the Vajra Realm, one accomplishes each of them.

original: de nas rnam par snang mdzad rin chen 'bebs pa'i bar gyi chos dang las dang phyag rgya chen po rnams kyis rgyas btab la /
analyzed: de nas rnam par snang mdzad rin chen 'bebs pa'i bar gyi chos dang las dang phyag rgya chen po rnams kyis rgyas btab la /
translated: Then, with the Dharma, action, and great pledge seals of Vairocana up to Ratnamakiiya, one seals them.

original: rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma'i phyag rgyas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad byin gyis brlabs te /
analyzed: rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma'i phyag rgyas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad byin gyis brlabs te /
translated: Then, with the seal of Vajradhatviśvarī, one empowers all the Ones-Gone-Thus.

original: rdo rje nor bu rin po che bcings nas /
analyzed: rdo rje nor bu rin po che bcings nas /
translated: Having bound the vajra jewel,

original: don thams cad grub pa la sogs pa rin po che'i rigs kyi lha thams cad kyi snying gar byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
analyzed: don thams cad grub pa la sogs pa rin po che'i rigs kyi lha thams cad kyi snying gar byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
translated: one empowers the heart of all the deities of the jewel lineage, such as Sarvarthasiddhi, and so forth.

original: yang rdo rje rin po che myu gu ma bcings te /
analyzed: yang rdo rje rin po che myu gu ma bcings te /
translated: Again, having bound the vajra jewel sprout,

original: thams cad kyi dpral ba'i phyogs su byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
analyzed: thams cad kyi dpral ba'i phyogs su byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
translated: one empowers the forehead of all.

original: rin po che padma las lkog ma'i phyogs dang / rdo rje rin chen char 'bebs mas spyi bor byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
analyzed: rin po che padma las lkog ma'i phyogs dang / rdo rje rin chen char 'bebs mas spyi bor byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
translated: With the jewel lotus, one empowers the throat, and with the vajra jewel rain, one empowers the crown of the head.

original: de nas rdo rje dbyings las bshad pa'i rdo rje rin chen gyi @103a * //
analyzed: de nas rdo rje dbyings las bshad pa'i rdo rje rin chen gyi @103a * //
translated: Then, as explained in the vajra basic space of phenomena, you visualize the vajra jewel.🔽

original: phyag rgyas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la dbang bskur ba dang / rin po che'i rigs thams cad la rdo rje rin po che'i myu gus dbang bskur bar bya'o //
analyzed: phyag rgyas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la dbang bskur ba dang / rin po che'i rigs thams cad la rdo rje rin po che'i myu gus dbang bskur bar bya'o //
translated: Then, with the vajra-jewel seal explained in the Vajra Realm Tantra, you should confer empowerment on all the transcendent ones and on all the jewel family members with the vajra-jewel sprout.

original: de nas snga ma bzhin du go cha bgo ba dang phreng ba bcing ba byas nas mthar mnyam pa'i thal mos mnyes par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas snga ma bzhin du go cha bgo ba dang phreng ba bcing ba byas nas mthar mnyam pa'i thal mos mnyes par bya'o //
translated: Then, as before, having donned the armor and bound the garland, you should please them with the gesture of supplication.

original: de nas rdo rje rin chen gyi phyag rgya'i rdo rje dang nor bu'i dril bu'i phyag rgyas bdag po'i dbang bskur la ming gi dbang bskur ba dang / dngos grub kyi rdo rje rin po che'i brtul zhugs kyang blang bar bya'o //
analyzed: de nas rdo rje rin chen gyi phyag rgya'i rdo rje dang nor bu'i dril bu'i phyag rgyas bdag po'i dbang bskur la ming gi dbang bskur ba dang / dngos grub kyi rdo rje rin po che'i brtul zhugs kyang blang bar bya'o //
translated: Then, with the vajra-jewel seal, confer the empowerment of the lord with the vajra and the bell with the jewel seal, and also take up the name empowerment and the spiritual powers, and the vajra-jewel conduct.

original: rin po che'i sgeg mo la sogs pa mchod pa brgyad kyis yang dag par mchod la /
analyzed: rin po che'i sgeg mo la sogs pa mchod pa brgyad kyis yang dag par mchod la /
translated: Then, with the eight offerings, such as the jewel-lady and so forth, you should make offerings.

original: rin po che'i las kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i mchod pa bcu drug gi phyag rgyas bdag nyid yang dag par mchod par bya'o //
analyzed: rin po che'i las kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i mchod pa bcu drug gi phyag rgyas bdag nyid yang dag par mchod par bya'o //
translated: One should make a perfect offering to oneself with the sixteen offerings spoken of in the Jewel Action Mandala.

original: de nyid kyis ni rin chen gzung //
analyzed: de nyid kyis ni rin chen gzung //
translated: One should hold the jewel

original: chos kyi dril bu dkrol bar bya //🔽dam tshig gis ni phyag rgya cher //
analyzed: chos kyi dril bu dkrol bar bya // dam tshig gis ni phyag rgya cher //
translated: and ring the Dharma-bell.🔽Having blessed the great seal with the pledge,

original: byin gyis brlabs nas snying po bzlas //
analyzed: byin gyis brlabs nas snying po bzlas //
translated: one should recite the essence.

original: de nas rang gi snying po len gsum bzlas la /
analyzed: de nas rang gi snying po len gsum bzlas la /
translated: Then, having recited one's essence three times,

original: aom badzra a'atma ko& ham zhes brjod cing /
analyzed: aom badzra a'atma ko& ham zhes brjod cing /
translated: one should say, Om Vajra-atmako 'ham.

original: lha thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang thugs bdag yin no zhes bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: lha thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang thugs bdag yin no zhes bsgom par bya'o //
translated: One should meditate, I am the body, speech, and mind of all deities.

original: de nas aom sva bh'a ba shuddho& ham zhes zlos shing gzugs brnyan dang mtshungs pa'i chos bdag med pa'i rang bzhin du bsam mo //
analyzed: de nas aom sva bh'a ba shuddho& ham zhes zlos shing gzugs brnyan dang mtshungs pa'i chos bdag med pa'i rang bzhin du bsam mo //
translated: Then, saying Om Svabhava-suddhô ham, one should imagine that one is the nature of reality, which is like a reflection and is devoid of self.

original: aom sarbba sa mo& ham zhes brjod cing /
analyzed: aom sarbba sa mo& ham zhes brjod cing /
translated: Saying Om Sarva-samo 'ham,

original: chos bdag med pa'i mnyam pa nyid kyis lha thams cad bdag nyid dang lhan cig tha mi dad par nges par byas nas /
analyzed: chos bdag med pa'i mnyam pa nyid kyis lha thams cad bdag nyid dang lhan cig tha mi dad par nges par byas nas /
translated: Having ascertained that all the deities are not different from oneself by means of the sameness of the objective selflessness,

original: 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'i sku dang / gsung dang thugs rdo rje bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'i sku dang / gsung dang thugs rdo rje bsgom par bya'o //
translated: one should meditate on the body, speech, and mind vajras of Ākāśagarbha, the noble one.

original: gzhung 'di tsam gyis rnal 'byor chen po rdzogs pa yin no //
analyzed: gzhung 'di tsam gyis rnal 'byor chen po rdzogs pa yin no //
translated: This much of the text completes the great yoga.

original: da ni gnas kyi nges pa bshad par bya ste /
analyzed: da ni gnas kyi nges pa bshad par bya ste /
translated: Now, the ascertainment of the place will be explained.

original: de la sngags pa'i rang gi snying ga na gnas pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la /
analyzed: de la sngags pa'i rang gi snying ga na gnas pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la /
translated: There, in the center of the moon maṇḍala that is in one’s heart,

original: rigs kyi bdag po bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying po dang / de'i mdun du nor bu'i mtshan ma dang / g-yas phyogs su rin chen rgyal po dang / g-yon phyogs su rin chen chags pa dang / rgyab tu rin chen legs pa'o //
analyzed: rigs kyi bdag po bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying po dang / de'i mdun du nor bu'i mtshan ma dang / g-yas phyogs su rin chen rgyal po dang / g-yon phyogs su rin chen chags pa dang / rgyab tu rin chen legs pa'o //
translated: the lord of the family, Bhagavān Ākāśagarbha, is in front, the sign of the jewel, to the right Ratnarāja, to the left Ratnasaṃbhava, and in back Ratnanetra.

original: yang rnal 'byor pa'i dpral ba'i phyogs su rin chen lta ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dbang bskur pa'i phreng ba dang / mgo bo'i rgyab tu rin chen nyi ma dang / phrag pa gnyis su rin chen dpal /
analyzed: yang rnal 'byor pa'i dpral ba'i phyogs su rin chen lta ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dbang bskur pa'i phreng ba dang / mgo bo'i rgyab tu rin chen nyi ma dang / phrag pa gnyis su rin chen dpal /
translated: Also, the yogin should visualize a jewel-gazing [bodhisattva] on the forehead, a garland of all the tathāgatas’ consecrations, a jewel sun on the back of the head, and a jewel glory on both shoulders.

original: so'i phreng ba gnyis la rin chen bzhad pa'o //
analyzed: so'i phreng ba gnyis la rin chen bzhad pa'o //
translated: On the two rows of teeth, a jewel laughter.

original: lkog ma'i phyogs su rin chen padma 'dzin dang / @103b gtong pa ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes kyi snying po'o //🔽nu ma gnyis kyi bar du rin chen rnon po /
analyzed: lkog ma'i phyogs su rin chen padma 'dzin dang / @103b gtong pa ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes kyi snying po'o // nu ma gnyis kyi bar du rin chen rnon po /
translated: On the throat, a jewel lotus-holder, and a jewel generosity, the essence of the wisdom of meditative concentration.🔽Between the two breasts, a jewel sharpness.

original: lte bar rin chen rgyu /
analyzed: lte bar rin chen rgyu /
translated: At the navel, a jewel stream.

original: lce la rin chen gsung ba'o //
analyzed: lce la rin chen gsung ba'o //
translated: On the tongue, a jewel speech.

original: spyi bor rin chen char 'bebs dang / rin chen mchod pa /
analyzed: spyi bor rin chen char 'bebs dang / rin chen mchod pa /
translated: On the crown of the head, a jewel rain-maker and a jewel worship.

original: nam tshong gnyis su rin chen go cha /🔽khar nor bu'i gnod sbyin /🔽dkur nor bu'i khu tshur ro //
analyzed: nam tshong gnyis su rin chen go cha / khar nor bu'i gnod sbyin / dkur nor bu'i khu tshur ro //
translated: On the two shoulders, a jewel armor.🔽In the mouth, a jewel yakṣa.🔽On the chest, a jewel fist.

original: nor bu'i mtshan ma'i g-yon phyogs su nor bu sgeg mo /
analyzed: nor bu'i mtshan ma'i g-yon phyogs su nor bu sgeg mo /
translated: To the left of the jewel sign, a jewel charm.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dbang bskur ba'i rin po che phreng pa'i g-yon du rin chen phreng ba ma /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dbang bskur ba'i rin po che phreng pa'i g-yon du rin chen phreng ba ma /
translated: To the left of the crest-jewel of the consecration of all the Tathāgatas is Ratna-mālā.

original: gtod pa ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes kyi snying po /🔽g-yon du rin chen glu ma /
analyzed: gtod pa ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes kyi snying po / g-yon du rin chen glu ma /
translated: The bestowal is the essence of the intuition of meditative concentration.🔽To the left of that is Ratna-gītā.

original: nor bu mchod pa'i g-yon du rin chen gar ma'o //
analyzed: nor bu mchod pa'i g-yon du rin chen gar ma'o //
translated: To the left of the jewel-worship is Ratna-nṛtyā.

original: yang rnal 'byor pa'i gsang ba'i gnas su rin chen bdug pa ma /
analyzed: yang rnal 'byor pa'i gsang ba'i gnas su rin chen bdug pa ma /
translated: Again, in the secret place of the yogī is Ratna-dhūpā.

original: mgo bor rin chen me tog ma /
analyzed: mgo bor rin chen me tog ma /
translated: On the head is Ratna-puṣpā.

original: mig gnyis la rin chen mar me ma /
analyzed: mig gnyis la rin chen mar me ma /
translated: In the two eyes is Ratna-dīpa.

original: nu ma dang brang dang snying gar rin chen byug pa ma /🔽brlag g-yas pa la rin chen lcags kyu /🔽brla g-yon pa la rin chen zhags pa /
analyzed: nu ma dang brang dang snying gar rin chen byug pa ma / brlag g-yas pa la rin chen lcags kyu / brla g-yon pa la rin chen zhags pa /
translated: On the breasts, chest, and heart is Ratna-gandhā.🔽On the right thigh is Ratna-pāśa.🔽On the left thigh is Ratna-śṛṅkhalā.🔽On the right hip is Ratna-sphoṭa.

original: byin pa g-yas pa la rin chen lcags sgrog /🔽byin pa g-yon pa la rin chen 'bebs pa rnams yang dag par bzhugs pa'o //
analyzed: byin pa g-yas pa la rin chen lcags sgrog / byin pa g-yon pa la rin chen 'bebs pa rnams yang dag par bzhugs pa'o //
translated: On the left hip is Ratna-āveśa.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni yan lag thams cad la chu dang 'o ma 'dres pa bzhin du bzhugs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni yan lag thams cad la chu dang 'o ma 'dres pa bzhin du bzhugs so //
translated: The Tathāgatas are present in all the limbs, like water and milk mixed together.

original: nyin re bzhin du rnal 'byor chen po byas la bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: nyin re bzhin du rnal 'byor chen po byas la bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: One should practice daily, performing the great yoga.

original: de ltar rnal 'byor chen po byas nas thun bzhi'i sbyor bas thams cad kyi sngags 'bum bzlas la bsgrub par bya ba'am /
analyzed: de ltar rnal 'byor chen po byas nas thun bzhi'i sbyor bas thams cad kyi sngags 'bum bzlas la bsgrub par bya ba'am /
translated: Having performed the great yoga in this way, one should practice, reciting the mantra of all [the deities] one hundred thousand times, applying oneself in four sessions.

original: yang na rang gi snying gar 'chad par 'gyur ba'i phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i tshul gyis don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po bsgoms te /
analyzed: yang na rang gi snying gar 'chad par 'gyur ba'i phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i tshul gyis don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po bsgoms te /
translated: Or else, one should meditate on the great maṇḍala of all accomplishments in the manner explained in the maṇḍala of the four seals in one’s heart center, as will be explained.

original: zla ba gcig gam /
analyzed: zla ba gcig gam /
translated: For one month,

original: zla ba drug gam /
analyzed: zla ba drug gam /
translated: or six months,

original: lo gcig gi bar du ji srid dkyil 'khor mngon sum du mthong bar gyur pa de srid kyi bar du bsgom par bya ba'am /
analyzed: lo gcig gi bar du ji srid dkyil 'khor mngon sum du mthong bar gyur pa de srid kyi bar du bsgom par bya ba'am /
translated: or one year, one should meditate for as long as one sees the maṇḍala directly.

original: yang na ji skad bshad pa'i rnal 'byor chen po bsgrubs nas /
analyzed: yang na ji skad bshad pa'i rnal 'byor chen po bsgrubs nas /
translated: Or else, having accomplished the great yoga as explained,

original: 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'i phyag rgya chen po bcings la /
analyzed: 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'i phyag rgya chen po bcings la /
translated: one should bind the great seal of Ārya Ākāśagarbha,

original: nam mkha'i phyogs su gnas te /

analyzed: de nas nam mkha'i phyogs su stong gsum pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi tshad dang mnyam pa'i zla ba'i mdog can gyi yi ge kham rnam par snang mdzad kyi rang bzhin 'o ma can gyi chu dang mtshungs pa'i bdud rtsi'i char gyi rgyun gyis bsregs pa'i sangs rgyas
translated: The stream of the rain of amṛta burns the buddha realm.

analyzed: yi ge ram des chu bskol bas rin po che chen po'i padma'i rgyal po dpag tshad bye ba du ma'i tshad dang mnyam pa'i gzugs yongs su gyur pa de rin po che padma mtha' yas pas yongs su bskor ba'i padma de'i rtsa ba'i yi ge pra gser gyi
translated: By that syllable ram, the water is heated, and it becomes a great king of lotuses, made of jewels, with a form equal to many millions of leagues. That lotus, surrounded by infinite jeweled lotuses, at its root has the syllable pra, the color of gold.

analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad kyi gnas su aa sam ai zhes bya bas seng ge dang padma'i gdan la /
